44013008	Dinino, animi ker dona ngebo sun Yunani nengdi er si tep, Elimas perami ngebodi utenepu. ‘Yesus teka tenepi neng tenerami utopu, aGubernur peda, teka teneprur’ tenen, Barnabas cap, Saulus cap sun peramrei upu tep, upu seku.
44013009	Elimasdi aneng sun upu sekupa, Saulus, ada si butene ngebo cadi, Paulus ton si perami ngebodi, Allah Lek Sambala er dipru dekpepupa, Elimas tep pio dipdolom pepmaudi pepu.
44013010	“Kanda Kain Jen Ngebo er mi kumemdi, akeca-keca yuma telep kwirye kun keca yuma yaniptamrum ngebo kurume. Tali upu peptapra inimtamna cap, mali kun keca cap, kan dipru neitamai tenimna weik kurume. Allah er kwiryepu pere upu dopra, kandi gwaliprap pememnge upuda, pio men tapkamrum do?
44013011	Ukuda, Allah puto di wenepkukere. Kan asuru pupkerepa, yambul metekanun ton cap, weik kuramemdi, keteng dirine men epkamrume,” Paulusdi Elimas tep pepu. Peterusdi aupu pepka deiki di, adipapu Elimas er asuru pupupa, tenpu keca peda men epmanto kupka cadi, ‘Ware ngebodi, ne buru talepnetudi, dubenetue’ tenen, kupembanmaue.
44013012	Aila nimi deiyo ngebo Gubernurdi, Elimas tep akupu keca epudi teka tenepu. AGubernur teka tenepudi, Yesus peteremna upu yuma tep, ‘Uo, angeda pio mambul upu,’ tenepu.
44013013	Uda, Paulus cap, er kikiman embarami neng cap, Papos mutu tapra, amutu di ila gapung co pum bukidi, laut mokon deiki di Pamfilia mutu beidi, Perga mutu welepi. Perga mutu welepidi, sun akunkoi taruda, Yohanes aneng tapra, ‘Tamupra Yerusalem mutu benkun’ tenen, beu.
44013014	Beupa, sun anengdi Perga mutu tapra, amutu di Pisidia tara neitamai Antiokia mutu bei. Bei dingeda, sun Yahudi yala deiyo neng Allah upu wengami tumi tep, Sabat tumi deiki di, sun Yahudi yala neng Allah upu gekerami ati wekrapidi, buki.
44013015	Bukipa, yuk nengdi, Allahdi, “Ukunkamrume, ange men kunkamrume,” peipupa Musa sekamu mem upu cap, tonda Allah peipupa, er upu lap pena deiyo neng, sun nabi-nabi neng sekami upu cap, akati nengdi konum pepyopda, sun Yahudi yala deiyo neng Allah upu geken ati deiyo nengdi, yuk neng tep upu peipipa, anengdi Paulus cap, Barnabas cap tep pepi. “Nun kayapu, dipru kwa dimna upu ton akapseryopda, nun peipserutume,” pepra moropi.
44013016	Upepra moropipa, Paulusdi tekrapudi, ‘Upu dimpepkununga’ tenen, buru bata deipudi, upu pepu. Ne kayapu, sun Israel nimi cap, sun Yahudi yala gum nesala, yuk mutu nesala dinin, Allah si eremrum nesala cap, ne upu gekepneso.
44013017	Israel nesala sun talenung Allahda, men di nun apu yapu wepra anuamudi, sun Mesir mutu neitamai, nimi bo neng utopu tup akurami taruda, Allahdi sun tep meliamua deiki di, Israel nesala gung weik kupbarami. Tonda, er meliamua deiki di, sun kurami keca yuma teleppu kuramu. Weik keipudi, Allah ila puto deiki di, nun apu yapu dopra, amutu neitamai di mepra dubeu.
44013018	Mepra dubeupa, sun anesaladi Allah tep mali kurami dinin, keteng tamun dengda 40 tahun deiki di, sunda mo gum mutu cadi, nimi men kurami mutu neitamai embarami taruda men tamamudi, pio melimamu.
44013019	Kanaan mutu neitamai kurami nesala amutu yala, amutu yala nesala yuma yonitam bari akurami dinin, Allah er pio meliamnga deiki di, Israel nesaladi amutu nesala yuma popbisipi. Popbisipipa, amutu-mutu nesala yuma, sun taleami mutu yuma, Allahdi Israel nesala tep karepu.
44013020	Allahdi akuramunge yumada, dukdongopra keteng tamun deng weik 450 tahun deiki di kuramu. Ayuma ukupyopda, Allahdi, ‘Israel nesala sun upu bongdina deiyo neng kunkameng’ tenen, sun nimi deiyo neng kareamupa, pio ukuramyanen, amenda taru, Allah er upu lap pena ngebo, nabi Samuel erepra deipupa, yana teku.
44013021	Samuel teku taruda, sun anengdi moropi. “Nun ila upu bongdin ngebo, Raja ngebo wepra deipseo,” pepra moropi. Sun moropipa, Allahdi, Benyamin yala ngebo, er sida Kis, er mi Saul, ‘Sun ila nimi deiyo ngebo Raja kunkamre’ tenen, wepra deipupa, Sauldi keteng tamun dengda 40 tahun deiki di, sun ila nimi deiyo ngebo Raja kuramu.
44013022	Amenda taru, Saul mali kupupa, Allahdi, Saul tapu di, ‘Yuk ngebo sun nimi deiyo ngebo, Raja kunkamre’ tenen, Saul pununa tep, Daud wepra deipu. Allahdi Daud tep tenepudi aupu pepu. “Isai er mi Daudda, ne cap nun dipru amsepu kunuma tep, nun kange tenpu doupnumu neng kunume. Nedi er tep, ‘Apel donkamre,’ tenememnya yumada, tek sisi er donkamre ja,” pepu. Paulusdi sun awekmai neng tep pepu.
44013023	Upepudi, aupu ton dukdongoprap pepu. Allahdi nun Israel neng nun apu yapu tep pediramutopu, Daud yala nengdi deipipa, dadeipdanen yakaramyanen, sirik tara ukuda Israel nesala, nun tep lyemserur ngebo Yesus wepra deiamnganen, konum karepmasere. Ada Daud yala nengdi deipya tep, Allahdi, ‘Ukunkamenge,’ peamutopu konum kupmasere.
44013024	Yesus kapul men yau taruda, Yohanesdi Israel nesala yuma tep, “Sun mali kurumu keca cap, sun dipru neitamai mali tenerumunge cap, ayuma taprumudi, sun dipru kwirye kecapu taleprumudi, me dongopkusene,” Yohanesdi pepu.
44013025	Yohanes er pel doramnganen, gawal dakamau taru di aupu pepu. “Sundi ne tep wareto ngebo tenenerum do? Sun tenenmanerum ngeboda ne gume. Ne gume dinino, angeboda namnyo tara yankamre ngeboda, erda pio ila ngebo cadi, ne tali ngebo kunune. Atep, er sandal tapu getedongon sandal dongoryada, nedi men loptaptene.” Yohanesdi pepu upu pepsene. Paulusdi sun Antiokia nesala tep pepu.
44013026	Upepu dingeda, Paulus aupu ton dukdongopra pepu. Ne kayapu, nun Abraham nyapu Yahudi yala nesala yuma cap, sun Yahudi yala gum nesala dinin, Allah teka teneprumdi gispal dorum nesalada, Allahdi nun yuma lyemserur upu nun tep konum kai dokotepmasere.
44013027	Sun Yerusalem mutu neng cap, sun deiyo neng capdi, ‘Yesusda, nun lyemserur ngebo adano,’ men tenerami dipunen, sun Yesus popi taruda, Allah upu lap pena neng, sun nabi-nabi nengdi, “Ukupkamenge,” pepra sekami upu utopu kupi. Allah upu lap pena neng, nabi nengdi sekami upuda, nun Sabat tumi yuma deiki di, Allah upu peteremna nengdi pesenunge.
44013028	Yerusalem mutu nesala cap, sun deiyo neng capdi, ‘Nesala mali kupnepa, poramep deiyo kecada, Yesus akeca mali kupmara deiki di popkamepe’ tenen, deiyo ton dipterepi dinin, men kupka cadi, men tenepi dinin, ‘Pilatus pepyopda sun popkamenge,’ tenepidi, Yesus pona tep, sundi Pilatus tep, “Yesus poipseo,” pepra moropi.
44013029	Allah upu lap pena neng, nabi nengdi, Yesus tep sekeiami upu utopu, ataru nesaladi ange yuma konum kupipa, depu pangeda, Yesus teka tenepi nengdi, sengdin co deiki di er nong dopra, nimi peirameng gel imir pumbon peipi.
44013030	Peipi dinin, Allahdi Yesus tamupra gam bukra deipu.
44013031	Gam bukeipupa, atumi-atumi tenpu-tenpu dinin, amutu-mutu belepra teknepa, nimidi dirami. Ada, er cap men di Galilea mutu di Yerusalem mutu kikiman embarami nengdi Yesus dirami. Sun diramidi, ukuda nun Israel neng tep, Yesus er peteremamunge cap, kuramunge cap, lap pesenunge.
44013032	Ukuda, nundi sun tep, kai telep upu, nimi lyemna upu penmasepe. Allahdi nun apu yapu tep pediramutopu, Yesus gam bukra deipka deiki di, sun nyapu nun ukutaru kunup neng tep, nong konum kupmasere. Yesus gam bukra deipka deiki di, pio gam kuna deiyo keca konum karepmasere. Mazmur dua sekeiamu upu pepkusene. Aupuda ake. ‘Kanda, ne Mi Sisa kurume. Atumida, neda kan nai kunmakene.’
44013034	Allah er mi depu taruda, ‘Kange di pio men depkamre’ tenen, Allahdi tamupra gam bukra deipu. Er gam bukra deipu ngeda, menop taru sekeiami upu deiki di, ukutaru konum kael kemnupe. Allahdi peamu upu ake. ‘Daud tep pediramsitopu, sun peda pio telep keca, ada pio gam kuna deiyo keca, tek sisi karepkamsene.’ Allahdi pepu.
44013035	Tonda yukai sekami upuda ake. ‘Kandi wepra deiamumpa, pio dumsisipu kunkamre ngebo, kan Mi Sisa amenda taru depyopda, pio men lyupkamre.’ Aupu pepunge deiyoda, ada Daud tep gume. Ada Yesus tep peipu.
44013036	Daud kuramu taru Allahdi, ‘Daud apel donkamre,’ tenemu pel doramnganen, gawal konum dakudi, depu pangeda, er apu yapu peiramyaipu peipipa, er bolpu lyupu.
44013037	Dinino, nun penmap ngebo Yesusda, depmaupane, Allahdi gam bukra deipu ngeboda, kange di men depu. Tonda, pio men lyupke.
44013038	Ne kayapu, ange tep ngeda, ‘Sun kaele kepkuruma’ tenen, lape pepsene. Allahdi Yesus deiki dipapu, nun mali kupe keca cap, nun kange dipru mali tenenange cap, gum kupra deriseredi, kaukemserure. Ware nesala do yuma, Yesus tep teka tenepmengopda, mali keca di sun dipru cap, kange cap, talepra moupseudi, upu mouserur keca yuma, Yesus deiki dipu lyemseredi lotamserure. Musa sekamseu upu utopu kurumnya deiki di, mali keca talepseuada, lyepra men loptapsetue.
44013040	Uda, Allah lap pena neng peiamseitopu, ‘Men kupkamser’ tenen, moupra dinkamrume. Sun nabi nengdi peiami upuda ake.
44013041	‘Sun nyek-nyek perumu nengda gekepso! Pio tenimtonapu kuramrumyanen, depkamrume. Sun gam kurumu taruda, nedi pio mambul pel dopkamne dinino, yuk nengdi sun tep lap pepsetenga peda, men gekepkamrume.’ Paulusdi Habakuk sekeiamu upu cap, Paulus er upu cap, konum pepkopda, aupu sengpepu.
44013042	Paulus cap, Barnabas cap, sun Yahudi yala nengdi, Allah upu peteremna ati neitamai di benkurei taruda, sun peprei upu gekepmai nengdi moropi. “Sun pepserum upuda, aminggu pepra orSabat tumi di, ton cap dukdongoprap pepkamsurume,” pepra moropi.
44013043	Moropipa, aupu gekepmai neng yuma bendopyopda, Yahudi neng cap, tonda yuk mutu nesala dinin, Yahudi yala neng teka teneraminge yuma, sun peda kael kepra teka tenerami neng cap, Paulus cap, Barnabas cap, kikiman bei. Kikiman bei pangeda, Paulus cap, Barnabas capdi, aneng tep aupu peprei. “Ukutaru Allahdi er puto di melimserur keca, er kange dipu bicau teneseredi, tali karerserya deiki di kurume. Ange pio talepra kurumudi, Allah tep pio men tamkamrume,” pepra, aneng sun dipru tep kwadeiprei.
44013044	Ukupra dakuramyanen, pel dona gum di, bepe peikrap, sun Allah upu peteremna tumi, Sabat tumi kupkopda, amutu nesala yuma, ‘Allah upu gekepkamep’ tenen, bulupra weki.
44013045	Nesala weik bulupra wekipa, Yahudi yala deiyo nengdi awekmai neng epidi, aneng tep yu kupupa, dipru neitamai wilipra deipidi derepi. Derepidi, Paulus er penmau upu cap, ton er cap tep mali upu pepra upu seki.
44013046	Upu sekipa, Paulus cap, Barnabas cap, kwar dangna gum, puto di, tamupra apenmai neng tep peprei. “Pio telep ngeda, nundi Allah upu menmena sun pepsetenemepa gekeptum dinino, sun aupu tapmarumdi men gekepmarume. Ange tep ngeda, Allahdi gam pio kuna kareserur keca, ‘Men dopropkamepe’ tenen, sun kange dipu tenepdanmarumdi, aupu tapmaruma cadi, ukuda nunda Yahudi yala gum nesala tep, sun kori peterem benkamneme.”
44013047	Allahdi nun tep aupu peipseue. ‘Kan deiki dipu, nimi ban-ban yuma, mutu sirik im sirik dakunge nesala tep, ‘Lyemna keca dubenkamrum’ tenen, yuk-yuk mutu nesala dirine kemna tep, upna dirine utopu nedi wepra deipkene.’ Paulus cap, Barnabas capdi peprei.
44013048	Paulus cap, Barnabas cap, aupu yuma pepreipa, sun Yahudi yala gum nesala gekepidi kange deipidi, pepi. “Uo, Allah er upuda pio mambule,” pepra Allah si erepi. Ukupidi, Allahdi, ‘Sun gam pio kuna deiyo keca dopropkameng’ tenen, men di anupra wepra deiamu nesalapu teka tenepi.
44013049	Ukuramyanen, amutu damai kurami nesala weik ton cap, nun nai Yesus upu gekeramidi, sun teka tenena neng sun gungda weik kupbarami.
44013050	Dinino, amenda taru, sun Yahudi yala deiyo nengdi, amutu Yunani kurami nerapu, sunda isomka kuramidi, Allah si eremami nerapu cap, tonda, amutu sisa ila-ila neng cap tep aupu pepi. “Paulus cap, Barnabas cap, sun nong deiki ikin keca deipkupe,” pepra, upu deiki di papra dokotepi. Upu deiki di papra dokotepipa, amutu nengdi, Paulus cap, Barnabas cap, sun nong deiki ikin keca deipidi, “Sun aneng bereso,” pepra, sun mutu neitamai di dokotepi.
44013051	Dokotepipa, Paulus cap, Barnabas capdi uteneprei. ‘Amutu nengdi Allah upu yaniptapmai atep, nun peda sun tep, tenena gum di, pio yaniptapra benkuneme,’ tenepreidi, sun sandal amutu tu bapmau sandal dopropreidi, amutu tu kiliptapra Ikonium mutu kwereprei.
44013052	Sun kwerepra berei dinin, sun atup kurami nesala, ada Antiokia mutu Yesus teka tenepra tup akurami nesalada, Allah er Lek Sambala sun dipru neitamai dekpepra dinikupa, kange deipra kurami.
44014001	Paulus cap, Barnabas cap, Ikonium mutu konum bereiyopda, Antiokia mutu kuramreitopu, Yahudi yala neng sun Allah upu peteremna ati wekrei. Akati wekreidi, sun Allah upu pio telep kupra peteremamrei atep, Yahudi yala neng cap, ton Yahudi yala gum nesala cap, weike teka tenepi.
44014002	Yuk Yahudi yala nengdi, ada Yesus tep teka men tenepi nengda, ‘Paulus cap, Barnabas cap, nun song cadi, yuk neng tep mali upu peptepepa, abutene nengdi sun peteremrenge keca yanipkamenge,’ tenepidi, Yahudi yala gum nesala tep, minina upu peramiya deiki di yu kemdiramipa, Yahudi yala gum nesaladi, Paulus cap, Barnabas cap tep mali kange doupi.
44014003	Paulus cap, Barnabas cap, sun peteremamrei taru yumada, Yahudi yala nengdi, yuk yala neng tep yu kemdirami dinin, abutene nengda kwar dangna gum dipu, Yesus upu tupa peteremamrei. Sundi, “Yesus erda nesala yuma tep, bicau teneseredi, tali melimserur ngebo,” pepra upu peteremamrei. Peteremamrei taruda, ‘Aupu gekerami neng teka tenenkameng’ tenen, Yesusdi er puto Paulus cap, Barnabas cap, sun aneng nong deikipu deipupa, sundi nimi men kupmanto pel doramrei. Tonda, amambul pel doramrei pangeda, akeca dirami nengdi, ‘Uo, tek sisi aneng deiki di, Allahdi pio mambul pel donmaser’ tenen, kael keami.
44014004	Akati arum domyai kurami nesala tenpu dinin, neitamai bokrapidi, ton tara nengdi, Yahudi yala neng sun upu gekerami. Ton tara nengda, Paulus cap, Barnabas cap, sun peteremrei upupu teka tenepra gekerami. Ukuramya tep, amutu nesala kange yuk-yuk tenepidi bongdorami.
44014005	Bongdoramidi, Yahudi yala gum nesala pe, Yahudi yala nesala pe, sun cap, sun nimi deiyo neng cap, tenpu-tenpu upu sisingamidi, ‘Ikin keca sun butene neng nong deiki deipmepedi, gel dopra sun nong deiki dopra popkamepe,’ teneramidi upu sisingami.
44014006	Utenerami dinin, Paulus cap, Barnabas cap, sun aneng teneraminge kael kepreidi, ‘Popsunung’ tenen, sepdaro bereidi, Likonia tara neitamai, Listra mutu cap, Derebe mutu cap damai, amutu neitamai yuma, ‘Yesusdi nimi lyemserure,’ pepra, Yesus er kai telep upu peterep embaramrei.
44014008	Listra mutu peteremamrei taruda, tenpu ngebo, yan pakopramu ngebo kuramu. Angeboda, er deiami taru di, yantang pakopropudi depupa, pio men embaramu.
44014009	Paulus peteremau taruda, angebodi er upu moupra gekenmau. Gekenmaupa, Paulusdi angebo ngopmauaipu dinmaudi, ‘Angeboda, teka tenipmanto ngebo kurure. Atep ngeda, teka tenepyopda, er yane dumsisikra deiptene,’ tenen, Paulus kael kepu.
44014010	Kael kepudi, dinmauanen, ila upu di angebo tep, “Kan yan tuai yanipra tekroyo,” pepu. Upepupa, angebo er bukmauai di, im kurukra tekroudi, tali-tali embanmau.
44014011	Uda abulupra wekmai neng, Paulus kupu keca sun epidi, sun Likonia upu deiki di, ila upu pepra gonga kepidi, apio perami. “Uo, nun allah-allah si eremnup keca, nimi nong utopu deiki di, abutene neng akonum yanmaserenge adano,” pepra ila upu perami.
44014012	Uperamidi Barnabas tep sun isok si, si eremami keca, er sida Seus perami. Paulusda, upu pena deiyo ngebo kuramnga tep, er tep ngeda, sun isok si Hermes perami.
44014013	Seus er si eremami atida, Listra ati arum domyai dinin, bura tara domi. Akati deiyo ngebo, ada Seus er karena deiyo ngeboda, erdi jem sapi cap, kait-kait keca lyumoprapudi, tapu kwanepra deipmau keca cap dopra, amutu ati arum domyai sirik tara wiami beilya buplan damai, tengyau. Ada mesum tep gume. ‘Akeca popmepya deiki di Paulus cap, Barnabas cap, gispal doprapmepedi, sun si erepkamep’ tenen, akeca dopra tengyau.
44014014	Ukupupa, yuk nengdi lap pepipa, Barnabas cap, Paulus cap aupu gekepreidi, akupkunge ngeda, ‘Waria tep kupkung do?’ tenen, sun mali kange doupreidi, sun deiki dongoramrei opkale gwelepra tapreidi, ‘Sun akupmang keca yapronkung’ tenen, aneng wekmaiyai neitamai sepra bereidi ila upu di peprei.
44014015	“Sun akunmarum ngeda waria tep do? Nunda tali kuramenge nesala utopu kunume. Nun tali tuai nengpu kunume. Nundi sun tep, ‘Yesusdi nimi lyemserure,’ pepra, Yesus er kai telep upu denmaseneme. Sun amutu nengdi tali keca si eremrumnyada, taprumudi, amnyo karikra, ‘Allah tek sisi kurur ngebo er sipu erepkamruma’ tenen, pepseneme. Allah tek sisi, erdi alau tara cap, tuai tara cap, laut mokon cap, aweneri keca neitamai kure keca yuma cap, ketekepra deipu ngeboda er pua. Atep er sipu eremkamrume.”
44014016	“Menop taruda, nesala ban-ban yuma, ‘Ange telepe,’ tenepra kuraminge yumada diramu dinin, ‘Yaproso,’ men pepseu. Tali dimpepra kuramudi, kaukeamseue.
44014017	Ukuramu dipunen, ‘Erda wareto Allah kurur do?’ tenen, lap pena tep kecada, men tapseu. Erdi nun bicau tep telep kweipseu kecada ake. Dua neitamai di mo kareserure. Tonda, nun jenup kecada, ataru-ataru jenge tep, yuk-yuk wepra kareserure. Tonda, nun jenup keca weika di kareserure. Tonda, nun dipru kange derinup keca yuma kareserepa, ‘Kange dekpepseupa pingpingapu kunupe,’ peramepe. Ange yuma kareserya deiki di, ‘E, Allahdi tek sisi bicau teneserure’ tenen, kael kemnupe,” Paulus cap, Barnabas capdi, awekmai neng tep peprei.
44014018	Aupu yuma peprei dipunen, awekmai neng sundi, ‘Asapi bisam cap, domba cap popmepya deiki di, abutene neng sun gispal dopmepedi, sun si erepkamepe,’ tenepi ngeda, men tapmanto kunmai. Ukunmaiya cadi, sun Paulus cap, Barnabas cap, sun upu weik pepreiya deiki dipapu, aneng sun tenipmai keca yaproi.
44014019	Amenda taru, Antiokia mutu cap, Ikonium mutu capdi, Yahudi yala neng yanmaidi, sun upu pepya tep, awekmai neng gekepidi, ‘Aneng tek penmasenge,’ tenepidi, sun peda aneng pepi upupu teka tenepidi, Yahudi yala neng tara keproi. Yahudi yala neng tara keproidi, gel dopra Paulus er nong deiki doprapidi, popidi, ‘Konum depmare,’ tenepidi, er nong dopra sun ati arum domyai bura tara gipra bena deipi.
44014020	Deipidi, ‘Konum depmare,’ tenepmaipune, sun Yesus teka tenepi nengdi, Paulus er nong damai bulupra dana-dana wekidi, Allah moropi pangeda, Paulus bukra tekroudi, akati arum domyai neitamai kange di weku. Wekudi mapmaua berekupa, Paulus cap, Barnabas cap, amutu tapra, ‘Derebe mutu benkunem’ tenen, berei.
44014021	Derebe mutu bereyopda, ‘Yesus dipu nimi lyemserure,’ pepra, Yesus er kai telep upu peterepreipa, nesala weik teka tenepidi, Yesus er kuramu keca piripra kael kepidi talepra kurami.
44014022	Amenda taru, amutu weneri Listra mutu cap, Ikonium mutu cap, Antiokia mutu cap, Yesus teka tenepi neng tep amutu tamupra peterep embaramreidi, aneng dipru puto kudiramrei. Aneng dipru puto kudiramreidi, amutu neng Yesus teka tenepra pio talepi ngeda atalepya utopu, ‘Pio dimpepra kunkamenge’ tenen, sun dipru kwa dimamrei. Ukuramreidi aupu peprei. “Nun teka tenenup nesalada, ikin keca weik neitamai dipu, Allah pio talepkamser taru wekamepe. Tali kange doupra kanam dipapu men wektepe,” peprei.
44014023	Upepreidi Paulus cap, Barnabas capdi, ‘Apelpu donkameng’ tenen, sun Allah teka tenepi neng, ‘Sun deiyo neng kunkameng’ tenen, nimi yuk-yuk amutu neng, amutu neng, yuma wepra deipembaramrei. Aneng wepra deiprei taruda, sun butene nengdi ukuprei. Allah morona cap, Allah si eremna tep, jen si tena cap deiki di, amutu neng nun nai Yesus teka tenepya tep, ateka tenepi neng dopra, ‘Yesus dipu sun putapre keca pio melimkamre’ tenen, wepra deipembaramreidi, Yesus tep kareprei.
44014024	Ukupreidi, Pisidia mutu neitamai peterep embaramreiyanen, Pamfilia tara berei.
44014025	Ubereidi, Perga mutu Allah upu konum peterepyopda, Atalia mutu kwereprei.
44014026	Atalia mutu kwerepreidi, gapung co deiki wekra bukreidi, laut mokon deiki baramreianen, Antiokia mutu tamupra berei. Ada, ukupu gawal dakrei pelda, kapul men pel doramrei taru, benkurei taruda, sun Antiokia mutu nesaladi, ‘Allah er melimna deiki dipu apel dopkamrenge’ tenen, men di wepra deiami. Atep ngeda, ka tamupra Antiokia mutupu berei.
44014027	Bereidi, sundi pepreipa, amutu teka tenepi neng bulupra wekipa, sun Allahdi meliamupa sun doramrei pel yumada, lap peprei. Tonda, “Allahdi tali Yahudi yala gum nesala tep, ‘Teka tenepkamenge,’ tenepu tarupu, konum kupmare. Atep, Allah melipmarpa konum teka tenenmange,” pepra, aupu ton lap peprei.
44014028	Lap pepreidi, amutupu kuramrei. Ada, sun cap, Yesus er kuramu keca piripra kael kepidi, pio teka tenepra taleami nesala cap, Antiokia mutu nesala cap, kikiman weikanun pio kurami.
44015001	Antiokia mutu kikiman kurami taruda, Yudea tara di nimi tenpu-tenpu Antiokia mutu beidi, amutu teka tenerami nesala tep, gonga kepra aupu peteremami. “Allahdi Musa tep peiamupa, Musadi Yahudi yala neng tep, ‘Sun den bam bol deiki tara sengkamrume,’ peprapudi seku. Ange tep ngeda, Musa peteremamseutopu, sun Yahudi yala gum neng peda, sun den bam bol deiki tarange sengkamrume. Sun den bam bol deiki tarange men sekrumyopda, Allahdi men lyepkamsere,” pepra aneng dipu peteremami.
44015002	Aupu peteremami atep, Paulus cap, Barnabas capda, yu kupupa, sundi, ‘Gume, nun deiyo ngebo Yesusdi, aupu men peterepseue,’ peprei. Upepreidi, ‘Den bam bol sengna mambule,’ pepra aupu peteremami neng cap, abutene neng capdi, yu kupdaramidi upu weik pepdai. Ange tep ngeda, amutu teka tenemi nengdi, ‘Paulus cap, Barnabas cap, ton yuk teka tenerami neng cap, Yerusalem mutu dokotepkup’ tenen, wepra deipi. Deiyoda, ‘Aneng Yerusalem mutu bengedi, Yesus wepra deipu neng cap, Yerusalem mutu teka tenerami neng, sun deiyo neng cap, nun upu pepdapu upu tep, upu sisingkamenge,’ tenen, wepra deipi. Ada, ‘Den bam bol deiki tarange sengna tep ngeda, ware kupkamep do?’ tenepidi, ‘Yerusalem mutu bengedi, upu talepkameng’ tenen, wepra deipi.
44015003	Uda, Antiokia mutu teka tenepra kurami nesaladi, ‘Aneng Yerusalem mutu benkameng’ tenen, dokotepipa, Fenisia tara neitamai cap, Samaria tara neitamai cap, bisi mapbarami. Amutu neitamai bisi mapbarami taruda, Yahudi yala gum nesala, sun mali kurami keca taprap amnyo karikroidi, Yesus teka tenepra dopropidi taleamingepu, aupu lap perbarami. Aupu kai lap perbaramipa, amutu neitamai teka tenepra kurami nesala gekepidi, ‘E, Yahudi yala gum nesala peda, Yesus tep konum teka tenepi’ tenen, kael kepidi, pio kange deipi.
44015004	Aneng wepra deipidi, dokotepipa, bisi embaramyanen, Yerusalem mutu beiyopda, Yerusalem mutu teka tenerami neng cap, Yesusdi wepra deiamu neng cap, amutu teka tenepi neng, sun deiyo neng cap, sun yumadi ayai neng tep, “Telepe,” pepra gispal dopi. Gisal dopipa, Barnabas cap, Paulus capdi, awekmai neng tep, Allah meliamnga deiki sun doramrei pel yuma lap peprei.
44015005	Lap pepreipane, yuk teka tenepi neng, sun gungda Farisi perami nengdi tekra aupu pepi. “Sun Yahudi yala gum nesala peda, sun den bam bol deiki tarange adipapu tek sisi sengkamenge. Tonda, sun peda Allahdi ‘Ukunkamrume, ange men kunkamrume,’ peipupa, Musadi sekeiamu upu deiki di, mem upu tupa peseretopu, aupu yuma teka tenepra, ange dopra pio talepra kunkamenge. Sundi aneng tep upenkamrume,” Farisi nengdi peipi.
44015006	Sun yuma upepipa, Peterus cap, ton yuk neng, Yesusdi wepra deiamu neng cap, amutu teka tenepi neng, sun deiyo neng cap, ‘Yahudi yala gum nengda, den bam bol deiki tarange adipapu sengkameng do, gum do? Angeda ware kunkamep do?’ tenepidi, ‘Aupu moupra tenipetepmepedi upu talepkamep’ tenen, bulupra weki.
44015007	Upu weik talepmaidi, Peterus pe, sun pe, pio lemnapu kunmaipa, Peterus tekrapudi, aupu talepmai neng tep pepu. “Ne kayapu, sun kaele. Nun kikiman kuramupka neitamai, men di Allah wepra deipneue. Ada, Allahdi, ne wepra deipneua deiyoda ake. Ada nedi Yahudi yala gum nesala tep, ‘Yesusdi nimi lyemserure,’ pepra peterenkamna deiki di, Yesus er kai telep upu gekenkamenge. Aupu pepnepa, gekepmengedi, ‘Yesusdi lyepkamser’ tenen, teka tenenkamenge. ‘Apel donkamre’ tenen, Allahdi weipneue.
44015008	Allahdi nun dipru kange neitamai tenenup keca kael kemserure. Allahdi er Lek Sambala karepseutopu, sun Yahudi yala nesala peda, teka tenepya deiki di, er Lek Sambala sun tep konum karepu. Ange kupka deiki di, ‘Sun Yahudi yala gum nesala peda teka tenepmengepa, ne nyapu kutenge’ tenen, Allahdi konum lap pepmasere.
44015009	Nun pe, sun pe yuk-yuk men teneserura cadi, sun teka tenepya deiki di, Allahdi sun dipruai mali keca kwamu ngeda daipudi, telep kweipu.
44015010	Nun apu yapu cap, nun cap, Musadi sekamu mem upuda, domembana tep, pirirtereramupu dinin, ikin kwamseupa, ange yuma men kupmanto kuramupu. Allahdi Yahudi yala gum nesala tep, ‘Musa sekeiamu upu yuma gekepmengedi, talepra dombenkamenge. Akupmenga deiki dipu lyepkamne,’ men pemu dinin, sundi sun Yahudi yala gum nesala tep, ‘Aupu yuma talepra dombenkamenge,’ penmarume. Upenmarumnya deiki di, Yahudi yala gum nesala, sun nong deiki pio ikin keca derinmarume. Angeda, nun Yahudi yala nesala peda, men kupmanto kuramepu. Atep, ware keca deiyo tep aikin keca sun nong deiki derinkamrum do? Ukuprumnyopda, Allah derepkamsere. Atep, ukurumnya deiki di, Allah tep kurpetenmarume. Angeda, waria tep do?
44015011	Ada pio gume. Nun teka tenenupada pepkusene. Ada, nun deiyo ngebo Yesusdi, nun bicau tep tali melipra kareserur keca deiki dipu, teka tenepepa, Allahdi lyemserure. Mem upu talepra ikin pel dopmepya deiki di men lyemserure. Angeda pio utopu, Allahdi sun Yahudi yala gum nesala peda, bicau tenereya deiki dipu lyemrure.” Peterusdi agekenmai neng tep pepu.
44015012	Uda Peterus upepupa, Barnabas cap, Paulus capdi upu ton cap peprei. Ada, sun Yahudi yala gum nesala kuramya neitamai di, Allah meliamua deiki di, Barnabas cap, Paulus capdi nimi men kupmanto keca pel doramrei. Apel doramrei pangeda, sun dirami nengdi, ‘E, tek sisi Allahdi abutene neng deiki di pel donmasere,’ tenen, kael keami. Apel doramreinge yuma lap penmarei taruda, sun awekmai neng yumadi, ‘Uo’ tenen, upu dimpepra gekenapu kunmai.
44015013	Barnabas cap, Paulus cap, upu konum penmareianen, sengpepyopda, dimpeprei pangeda, Yakobusdi pepu. Ne kayapu, ne upu gekepneso.
44015014	Nun kabo Simon Peterusdi konum lap penmasere. Allahdi Yahudi yala gum nesala neitamai di, ‘Ne mawa’ tenen, nimi ton menmena wepra deiamupa, sundi Yesus tep konum teka tenepi. Ukupka deiki di, erdi nesala ban-ban yuma tep bicaue teneseryada, konum lap pepra peterepsue. Ayumada, Simondi konum lap pepmaser adano.
44015015	Peterus ukupu pepmaser upu cap, Allah upu lap pena neng sekami upu cap, amsepu kupmare. Allah upu lap pena neng, nabi-nabi neng sekami upuda ake.
44015016	‘Amenda taru, ne tamupra yanedi Daud er loka beu atida kange di lepsikrap dopkaman ja. Akati pun dea lokmamer atida, lepsikra telep kupra dopkamne.
44015017	Ukupnepa, yuk nesala ban-ban yuma ada, menop taru di men wepra deiamsi nesala, Yahudi yala gum nesaladi, ‘Allahdi lyepkamser’ tenen, epterepkamneng ja. Ne Allah tep teka tenepmengyopda, lyepkamne.
44015018	Allah er dipu akeca yuma pel dorure. Men di akeca katuai lap peamupa, nimi kael kemenga deiyo ngeboda Allah er pua. Erdi aupu peamu.’
44015019	Yakobus aupu pepudi, dukdongopra aupu ton cap pepu. “Ange tep ngeda, ne kayapu ne tenepmanada, sun Yahudi yala gum nesalada, sun mali kunge keca taprapmengedi, amnyo karikra Yesus tep teka tenenung nesalada, nun Yahudi yala nesaladi, ‘Musa sekeiamu upu ton talepra kunkamrume,’ pepmepya deiki di, sun nong deiki ikin keca ton cap men derinkamepe.
44015020	Ange men kupkamep dinino, telepngepu ukupkamep ngeda, surat sekmepedi, sun kori dokotepkamepe. Pio men kupkameng kecada, ukuprap pepkamepe. Ware jen keca do yuma, nimidi si tali eremenge keca, ‘Gisal dopra si erepkamep’ tenen, popra karemenge ngeda, nun men jeptepe kecada, sun Yahudi yala gum nesala peda ajen keca yala-yala yuma pio men jenkamenge. Tonda, upula di tali nyangdana keca yuma pio men kunkamenge. Tonda, kum olokdongopra popmengopda, yapi men sangamre keca yuma, nong galepra pio men jenkamenge. Tonda, yapi mokon yala yuma pio men jenkamenge. Ukuprap pepkamepe,” Yakobusdi pepu. Upepudi, aupu ton pepu.
44015021	“Nundi, ‘Ange men kunkamrume,’ pepra surat sekra penkamep upuda, mesum tep gume. Aupu yumada, Musa sekeiamu upu neitamai kurura tepa. Pumun taru di ukutaru yumada, Musa sekeiamu upu peteremamipa, nun mutu-mutu yuma nun Yahudi yala neng Allah si eremnup ati neitamai, Sabat tumi yuma deiki di tupa peteresengepa, aupu tupa gekenupa tep pepne.” Yakobusdi pepu.
44015022	Yakobusdi apepka tep, amenda taru, Yesusdi wepra deipu neng cap, amutu teka tenerami neng cap, sun deiyo neng cap, sun yuma kikiman tenepidi, ‘Nun akunmap neng neitamai di, yuk neng ton wepra deipkamepepa, Paulus cap, Barnabas cap wisipra Antiokia mutu benkameng,’ tenepi. Utenepidi Yudas er si ton Barsabas perami ngeboda, er cap, Silas cap, wepra deipi. Abutene nengda, amutu teka tenepi nengdi, abutene neng tep, gispal doramidi, ‘Sunda pio telep neng,’ teneramya tep, abutene neng wepra deipi.
44015023	Yesusdi wepra deiamu neng cap, amutu teka tenerami neng, sun deiyo neng capdi, ‘Asurat dopra karerbenkameng’ tenen, awepra deipi neng tep, surat karepi. Asurat neitamai sun seki upu ake. Yahudi yala gum nesala, Antiokia ati arum domyai cap, Siria tara cap, Kilikia tara cap, amutu-mutu neitamai Yesus teka tenepra kurum nesala tep asurat sekeipsepe. Sun cap, nun capda Yesus teka tenenupa cadi, weite du utopu kunupe. Nundi Telepe pepsepe.
44015024	Sunda ikin kange doupra kunmarumnyada gekepmape. Ada nundi, “Ukunkamrume,” pepra men dokotepmepu dinin, nun kupya neitamai nengdi, yuk neng ton sun damai yaidi, sun peteremami upu deiki gekeprumdi, ‘Anengo, uo, ware kupkup do?’ tenen, pio ikin kange doupra kunmarumada gekepmape.
44015025	Atep, nun yuma kange tenpu deiki di tenepmepedi, ‘Nimi wepra, sun Yahudi yala gum nesala damai, nimi ton dokotepkamepe,’ tenepmupu. Uda nun kayapu neng sisa, Barnabas cap, Paulus cap, sun aneng tep pio bicaue kuserure. Sun anengda, sun kange tenena cap, sun dipru cap, sun nong yuma, ‘Nun deiyo ngebo Yesus, er upu peterepnemedi, er pelpu donkamnem’ tenen, Yesus tep kareprei. Yuk nengdi, ‘Yesus upu peteremrungada, nun songe’ tenen, abutene neng tep, portererami dinin, abutene nengda, Yesus er upu tep peteremrungada, men yamdongoramrei. Tupa apelpu dorurunge. Atep, ‘Anengda sun kori dokotepkamepe,’ tenepmupu. Tonda, ‘Nun mutu wepra deipmupu neng cap, aneng cap, wisipra kikiman sun damai yankamenge,’ tenepmupke.
44015027	Nun kan-kan di dokotepmap neng butene nengda, sun si Yudas cap, Silas cap, nundi asekmap upu tek sisi utopu, sun upu deiki di lap pepkamserenga tep, dokotepsepepa, sun kori peryankamserenge.
44015028	Allah er Lek Sambala cap, nun yuma cap, nun kange amsepu kikiman kupedi tenepmupka tep, ikin keca ton cap tapakrap, sun nong deiki men deipkamepe. Dinino, amambul mem keca puda, pio men kunkamrume.
44015029	Ware jen keca do yuma, yuk nengdi, ‘Nun nai’ tenen, si tali eremenge keca, ‘Gisal dopra si erepkamep’ tenen, popra karepmenge ngeda, nun teka tenenup neng men jeptepe kecada, sun Yahudi yala gum neng peda, ajen keca yala-yala yuma pio men jenkamrume. Tonda, yapi mokon yala yuma pio men jenkamrume. Tonda, kum olokdongopra popmengopda, yapi men sangamre keca yuma, nong galepra pio men jenkamrume. Tonda, upula tali nyangdana keca yuma pio men kunkamrume. Akeca pio men kuprumnyopda, teleppu kupra kunkamrume. Telepe, aupupu sekra deipmepe.
44015030	Uda awepra deipi neng dokotepipa, sundi Antiokia mutu beiyopda, sun pepipa Antiokia mutu teka tenepi neng yuma bulupra weki pangeda, Yerusalem deiyo nengdi seki surat karepi.
44015031	Asurat karepipa, Antiokia teka tenena neng, wekmaidi asurat dopra pepidi, asurat neitamai telep kwa dimna upu gekepya deiki di pio kange deipi.
44015032	Yudas cap, Silas cap, sun peda Allahdi peramu upu lap pena deiyo neng kuramreiya cadi, sundi amutu teka tenerami neng tep, dipru kwa dimna upu cap, dipru puto kemdina upu cap, upu weik peramrei.
44015033	Amutupu yambul weikanun ton cap kikiman kuramipane, ‘Aneng sun dokotemna deiyo nesala kori tamupra benkameng’ tenen, amutu teka tenepra weite du utopu kurami nengdi, telep upu pepra deipidi, “Telepe, kange doupra dabeso,” pepra, aupu kai yai neng tamupra dokotepi.
44015034	Dinino, Silasdi, ‘Acapu kunkamne,’ tenepudi amutupu yambul ton kuramu.
44015035	Tonda, Paulus cap, Barnabas cap, Antiokia mutu acapu weikanun ton kuramreianen, sun cap, nimi weik ton capdi, Yesus er upu lap pena cap, peteremna cap pel dorami.
44015036	Amenda taru, Paulusdi Barnabas tep pepu. “Nun beriyo! Nun butene nengdi Yesus er upu peteramnumu mutu yuma, tamupra benemedi, ‘Sunda ware kupra kunmang do? Telep kupra teka tup tenenung do, gum do?’ tenen, dipterepkamneme. Uruna kupra benkamneme,” Paulusdi Barnabas tep pepu.
44015037	Barnabasdi, ‘Yohanes ada yuk si ton Markus si penung ngeboda, er cap kikiman betepi’ tenen, putaramupa tenimamu.
44015038	Barnabasdi ange teneamudi pepu dinin, Paulusdi, ‘Gume. Angebo tapangnada yaprume. Yohanesda, Pamfilia tara di tapseudi, nun pel gawal men dangamnumu taru, tapseupa nun pel yuma wisipra pel men dopmupka tep, nundi er dopra kikiman men betepe,’ tenen, tenimamudi pepu.
44015039	Ukuprap yuk-yuk teneramrei atep, yu weik kupupa, upu weika di pepdarei. Adeiki dipu, yuk-yuk bokdarei. Bokdareidi, Barnabasdi Markus dopra, ila gapung co wekra bukreidi, ‘Siprus mutu benkamnem’ tenen, laut mokon deiki berei.
44015040	Dinino, Paulusdi Silas wepudi yukai beu. Ada, amutu teka tenerami nengdi, ‘Yesus er melimna deiki dipu apel donkamreng’ tenen, abutene neng tep, Allah moropidi, Yesus tep karepipa, berei.
44015041	Sun baramreianen, Paulus cap, Silas cap, Siria tara ton, Kilikia tara ton embaramreidi, amutu teka tenepra kurami nesala tep, sun teka tenepra pio talepi ngeda, ‘Atalepya utopu, puto di dimpepra kunkameng’ tenen, Paulusdi amutu neng tep, dipru puto kudiramu.
44016001	Uda Paulus cap, Silas cap bisi mapbaramreidi, baramreiyanen, Derebe mutu berei. Derebe mutu bereyopda, banmareiyanen, Listra mutu berei. Listra mutu neitamai Yesus er kuramu keca piripra kael keamu ngebo, er sida Timotius, er ninda, Yahudi yala ner, Yesus teka teneamu ner kuramu. Dinino, er naida, Yunani yala ngebo kuramu.
44016002	Listra mutu cap, Ikonium mutu cap, teka tenepra weite du utopu kurami nengdi, Timotius tep, ‘Angeboda pio telep ngebo,’ teneramidi, er tep telep upu perami.
44016003	Paulusdi Timotius tep, ‘Putaneryada, nedi er dopra kikiman benkamepe,’ tenepka tep, erdi Timotius dopra, yuk neng kori dubeupa, sundi Timotius er den bam bol deiki tara seki. Akupunge deiyoda, ake. Paulus embankamu mutu neitamai kurami neng yuma, Yahudi yala nesaladi, Timotius er nai Yunani yala ngebo kuramngada, konum kael keamya tepa. Yahudi yala nengdi, Timotius tep, ‘Den bam bol deiki tara sengna gum ngeboda nun songe,’ tenepnung tenen, Timotius er den bam bol deiki tarange seki.
44016004	Ukupyopda, sun Paulus cap, er kikiman embarami neng cap, beidi, ortara, Yerusalem mutu Yesus wepra deiamu neng cap, ton Yesus teka tenepi neng sun deiyo neng wisi neng capdi, ‘Yahudi yala gum nengdi ukupkamenge,’ tenepidi, surat seki upuda, amutu-mutu yuma lap pepra embarami. Lap perembaramidi, sun embarami mutu teka tenepi neng tep, ‘Aupu teka tenepra ange utopu kunkameng’ tenen, lap perembarami.
44016005	Ukurami atep, amutu teka tenepra Allah upu ati wengami nesalada, sun Yesus teka tenepra pio taleami ngeda, puto weik kupupa, pio dimpepra kurami. Tonda, tumi-tumi yuma yuk nesala ton cap teka tenepidi tapakipa, sun gung weik kepropnen barami.
44016006	Paulus cap, er kikiman embarami neng capdi, ‘Asia tara neitamai Yesus upu peterem benkamep,’ tenerami dinin, Allah er Lek Sambaladi upu sengdongoramnga tep, Asia tara men embarami dinin, Pirgia tara neitamai cap, Galatia tara neitamai cap, amutupu embarami.
44016007	Embaramidi Misia datara, Bitinia dortara neitamaida, wilipramngai beiyopda, Bitinia tara benterepi dinin, Yesus er Lek Sambaladi, ‘Amutu neitamai men embenkurume,’ pepra upu sekrou.
44016008	Upu sekroua tep, Misia tara wengna gum dinin, talipu baramyanen, Teroas mutu kwerepidi bei.
44016009	Teroas mutu beiyopda, bena mapmaiya lukunda neitamai di, kene utopu keca Paulus epu deiki di, Makedonia tara ngebo, tenpu ngebo tekudi, pio moropudi pepu. “Makedonia tara yamemdi, nun makupseo,” pepra moropu.
44016010	Paulusdi aken utopu keca deiki ange epudi, lap pepupa, nun yumadi tenepmupke. ‘Gume, Allahdi Paulus kene epka deiki konum lap pepmaser adano. Nundi, Makedonia tara nesala, Yesus lyemna upu peterepkamepe. Allahdi ange, konum tenepmaserada, konum kael kepmapa tep, adipapu, ‘Makedonia mutu peterembenkup’ tenen, ketenepmupke.’
44016011	Uda, Teroas mutu di, ila gapung co wekrap bukmupudi, kumanya puto deiki di laut mokon deiki banmapkanen, laut mokon neitamai Samoteres mutu bepu. Bena mapmapka, berekupa, Samoteres mutu di mokon deiki banmapkanen, Napolis mutu bemupu.
44016012	Napolis mutu di tuai bisi deiki Filipi mutu banmapudi, ue taru dumbarito amutupu kunmapu. Filipi mutuda, ada Propinsi Makedonia tara neitamai bokrap kwamu. Atara neitamai, sun Roma nesaladi ati arum domidi kurami mutu akwamu.
44016013	Amutupu kunmapka cadi, ‘Sabat tumi deiki di, Allah moronai apu akwapmare’ tenen, Filipi ati arum domyai sirik-sirik dana-dana wiami beilya buplan bisipra bura tara bena me damai bemupu. Aca bena bukmupudi, abulupra wekmai nerapu tep upu pepmupu.
44016014	Agekenmai nerapu neitamaida, ner tenpu, Tiatira mutu di yau nere, er sida Lidia, bukmaudi gekenmau. Lidiada, kunumna weik mirin opkal kunumna deiyo ner kuramua cadi, yuk nengdi er damai aopkal kunumami. Tonda, anerdi Allah teka tenepra, Allah er si eremamu. Anerda, Paulus er pepu upu gekenmaupa, Yesusdi, ‘Aner ne tep teka tenepredi gekepkamre’ tenen, er dipru buplan pakaipupa, Yesus tep teka tenepu.
44016015	Teka tenepupa, er cap, er atipum kikiman kurami nesala cap, teka tenepya tep, me dongopipa, erdi nun tep, ‘Nati yankurum’ tenen, moropseu. “Sundi ne tep, ‘Anerda nun nai bo Yesus tek sisi teka tenepmare,’ tenepmanuruma cadi, ne ati yarumudi, ke tarupu kikiman kunkamepe,” pepra moropseu. Weika di moropseua tep, er ati wekmupu.
44016016	Uda yuk taruda, sun Yahudi neng bulupra Allah mororamyai benmapu taru di, yuk nengdi, ‘Aner nun pel tali donkamser’ tenen, co bo deiki di kunuami ner tenpu bisi neitamai epmupu. Anerda, tenpu isok taleamnga di, aisok puto deiki di, amenda kupkamu keca yuk neng tep lap peramu. Anerdi yuk neng tep, “Amenda taru ukupkamsere,” pepra lap peramupa, anengdi co bo weik kareamipa, aner er taleami nengdi kunumna weik co bo dororami.
44016017	Anerdi Paulus cap, nun yuma cap tep domembaramseudi, ila upu di peramu. “Allah pio puto weik kuredi, akeca-keca yuma bisbisa kapra deiki tara kurur Allahda, anengda er pel melimna neng kungedi, ‘Allahdi Yesus tep teka tenepmepya deiki dipu lyemserure,’ pepra Yesusdi nimi lyemserur upu lap penmasenge,” pepra anerdi pio peramu.
44016018	Tumi-tumi yuma anerdi aupu pio pepembaramudi, nun tep domembaramupa, amenda sirik tarada, Paulusdi kange boktopupa, tamuprapudi, aner dipru neitamai kuramu isok tep, yu bikrapudi upu pepu. “Yesus Kristusda, er si cap, er puto deiki capdi, pepkene. Aner dipru neitamai gupra bura beo, pepkene!” pepu. Upepupa, adipapu aner taleamu isok aner tapra beu.
44016019	Amelimna ner kunuamidi taleamya deiyo nengdi, aner pel doramupa co bo dororamya deiyo keca, aisok bura beudi gum kupupa, kael kepi. Ange yuma konum kael kepidi yu kupupa, Paulus cap, Silas cap, talepra gipdaro beidi, ‘Akati arum domyai deiyo neng damai lap pepkup’ tenen, amutu nesala upu taleramyai gipra derirbei.
44016020	Ukupidi, amutu nesala sun deiyo neng damai abutene neng dopra deidi pepi. “AYahudi yala butene nengda, mali-mali kupmarengpa, nun amutu nesala pio mali kange dounmap adano. Sunda, ‘Ukupkamrum,’ pepmasereng upuda, nun amutu mem keca tep, upu bisipmaserenga tep, akecada, nun amutu nengdi men kuptepe. Tonda, nun Roma nesala kunupa cadi, sun pepmasereng upu dopra, nun Roma nesaladi men kuptepe,” pepi.
44016022	Upepipa, tali awekmai neng gekepidi, ‘Sun mali kurengepa, tek pepmasenge,’ tenepi. Utenepidi, arup pepmai neng upupu, sun atali wekmai nesala peda, Paulus cap, Silas cap tep pepi. Upepipa, amutu deiyo nengdi pepipa, Paulus cap, Silas cap, sun deiki dongorami opkale gweleptaprapidi, sun nong balana di popi.
44016023	Anengdi sun nong deiki weika di balana di popidi, abutene neng doprapidi, wenemna ati dongopi. Dongopidi amutu deiyo nengdi, awenemna ati kalengna deiyo ngebo tep pepi. “Kanda abutene neng tep, pio moupra kalekurume,” pepi.
44016024	Ukuprap pepya tep, awenemna ati kalengna deiyo ngebodi, ‘Paulus cap, Silas cap bererunge’ tenen, abutene neng doprapudi, awenemna ati pio atipum neitamai wiliami ati dongopudi, sun yane dana-dana pio kwaktaprapudi, ila ikin co bon potokmaiya neitamai dongopudi, getepdongopu.
44016025	Uda acapu akunmarengpane, manduk pena taruto kupupa, Paulus cap, Silas capdi, gispal dopra Allah si eremna tep, Allah morona cap, mut pena cap kunmareipane, awenemna ati pumbon men di wenepnedi dongorami nesaladi gekenmai.
44016026	Ukunmaipa, menmena di bime ila puto di long pepka deiki di, awenemna ati dela tu ikrap domyai peda long-long pepu. Adipapu awenemna atipum ati-ati yuma puto di paksingipupa, akati wenemna tep dongopi nesala yuma, sun getedongorami rantai tapu yuma sakroupu.
44016027	Ayuma ukupkopda, awenemna ati kalengna deiyo ngebo bukroudi, akati pumbon buplan yuma tali paktapnapu kupmaupa epu dingeda, ‘Akati wenemna tep dongopi neng yuma konum bendopmange,’ tenepka tep, er parang ya utopu keca doprapudi, ‘Nedi popdankune’ tenen, keteneipdau.
44016028	Ukupu dinin, Paulusdi, angebo tep ila upu deiki di pepu. “Kan podana yaprume. Nun yuma bura men bendopmape. Akunmap adano,” pepu.
44016029	Upepupa, awenemna ati kalengna deiyo ngebodi, “Weica deso,” peprapudi, Paulus cap, Silas cap, sun tekmareiai neitamai sepdaro beudi, kware tep er nong yuma moropsepudi, sun damai tuai loktapra depu.
44016030	Ukupudi, amenda taru, erdi sun wenemna ati pumbon di, sun dopra bura tara deudi asipterepu. “Anengo, sundi pepnereso. Ne ware keca kuptenepa, Allahdi lyepnetu do?” pepra asipetepu.
44016031	Asipterepupa, sun tamupra peprei. “Kanda, nun deiyo ngebo Yesus teka tenepmem pangeda, lyepkamker ja. Yesus tep teka tenepmumyopda kan cap, kan ati kikiman kunge nesala cap, lyepkamare,” peprei.
44016032	Upeprei dingeda, sun butene nengdi angebo cap, er ati kikiman kurami nesala yuma cap tep, “Yesusdi nun mali kunup keca gum kupra deipseredi, lyemserure,” pepra, Yesus er kai telep upu lap peprei.
44016033	Aupu lap pepreipa, alukundapu awenemna ati kalengna deiyo ngebodi, adipapu sun butene dopra, sun susu me kuprap kwetepu. Ukupupa, adipapu er cap, er nyapselip yuma cap, teka tenepipa, me dongoprei.
44016034	Me dongopreipa, awenemna ati kalengna deiyo ngebodi, er ati sisa pumbon abutene neng deudi, sun jen karepu. Tonda, sun yuma Allah teka tenepya tep, er cap, er ati kikiman kurami nesala cap, pio kange deipi.
44016035	Uda berekra konum kupkopda, akati arum domya deiyo nengdi, ‘Awenemna ati kalengna deiyo ngebo kori perbenkung’ tenen, sun melimna neng tep kai dakaipidi upu pepi. “Sun upu perberume. ‘Abutene neng lopra taprume,’ pepbankurume,” pepi.
44016036	Upepya tep, awenemna ati kalengna deiyo ngebodi, Paulus tep pepu. “Anengo, akati arum domya deiyo nengdi, ‘Abutene neng loptaprume’ pepmanenga tep, sun tali daberetume. Tali kange deipra dimpeprappu benkurume,” pepu.
44016037	Upepupa, Paulusdi amutu deiyo neng sun melimna nengda, kai upu peryanmai neng tep pepu. “Gumde. Nun butene nengda tali neng gume. Roma mutu ila deiyo nengdi, sun upu pepra deipseiya deiki di, Roma mutu nesala utopu neng keipsei atep, ‘Sunda Roma nesala kururunge,’ tenesenunge. Nunda Roma mutu neng kunum dipunen, sun anengdi, ‘Amali kupmarum keca deiki di wenepkusepe. Deiyo ake,’ men pepsei. Sundi yuk nesala damai dinmasiai, tali balana di popsei. Balena di popseidi, nun dopra wenemna atipum getepdongopsei. Ukuda, sundi tali dimpepra, ‘Aneng inipra dokotepkamepe,’ tenepmasengada, gume. Ada men kupmanto. Sun anengpu yangedi, nimi dinmasengai dipu, katuai loptapkamseng adano,” Paulusdi pepu.
44016038	Upepupa, aupu gekepmai nengdi, akati arum domya nimi deiyo neng tep bena lap pepipa, sun deiyo nengda, ‘Uo, Paulus cap, Silas capda, sun Roma neng kurunge. Dinino, nundi peipmappa, aneng wenepra balana di popmangue. Atep, sun Roma mutu ila nimi deiyo nengdi nun tep, wenepra poptapkamseng do?’ tenen, kware pio weik kupi.
44016039	Filipi mutu deiyo neng kware weik kupya tep, awenemna ati yanmaidi Paulus cap, Silas cap tep, upu moudiryaidi pepi. “Uo, nun mali kunmape,” pepra awenemna ati pumbon di bura tara dubeidi, ‘Sun ati arum domyai neitamai tapra yukai bendopkurenge’ tenen, Paulus cap, Silas cap tep, “Menmena yukai bereso,” pepra deipi.
44016040	Moropipa, Paulus cap, Silas cap, awenemna ati pumbon di bura konum bereyopda, Lidia ati berei. Lidia ati di sun cap, amutu teka tenepra weite du utopu kurami neng cap, bulupra wekmaipa, sun telep upu pepreiya deiki di, awekmai neng tep dipru kwa diprei. Ukupreiopda, sun cap, yuk neng cap, amutu tapra yuk mutu berei.
44017001	Uda Filipi mutu tapra beiyopda, bisi banmaiyanen, Amfipolis mutu cap, Apolonia mutu cap, neitamai bisipra, tenpu mutu, ada sun Yahudi yala nesala Allah upu peteremna ati domyai, Tesalonika mutu bei.
44017002	Tesalonika beiyopda, Paulusda, er mutu-mutu yuma pio ukuramnga utopu, amutu peda, sun Yahudi yala neng Allah upu peteremna ati weku. Sabat tumi weneri deiki di, erdi Allah upu peramnga deiki di, “Allahdi, ‘Mesias ngeboda, nesala yuma lyepredi talepkamre’ tenen, wepra dokotepseu ngeboda, ada Mesias ngebo. Er kange mun kupkamu keca cap, depudi kange di gam bukeipkamu upu cap, deiyo ake-ake,” pepra Paulusdi lap peramupa, upu talerdarami.
44017003	Paulusdi, “Nedi sun tep, ‘Yesus er upu ake,’ pepra lap pesenun ngeboda, tali ngebo gume. Yesus erda, ‘Allahdi nesala weik lyepkamre’ tenen, men di weamudi ukutaru dokotepseu ngeboda, Mesias akonuma. Yesusda Kristus kurure,” pepra aupu yuma lap peramu.
44017004	Ukupra lap pepra, peterepupa, sun Yahudi yala neng tenpu-tenpu cap, tonda Yahudi yala gum neng dinin, Allah er si eremami neng, Yunani neng weike cap, tonda amutu ila nerapu, metek gum, weike cap, teka tenepidi, Paulus cap, Silas cap, sun teka teneramreidi doproprei kecapu, ‘Nun peda teka tenepkamepe,’ tenepidi, sun kange yuk punupi. Sun kange yuk punupidi, Paulus cap, Silas cap, sun tarapu keproi.
44017005	Sun anengda, teka tenerami dinino, sun Yahudi yala deiyo nengdi, ‘Uo, nun upupu gekepsetengedi, nun tarapu kepsetenge dinino, waria tep aneng Paulus cap, Silas cap, sun upupu gekenmang do?’ tenen, mundu deiprapidi, aneng tep derepi. Derepidi, sun kunumamyai beidi, sun kunumna kunumamyai tali teknedi, dipra embarami nesala, sal-sal kun nesala, sun mankau kunmaipanen bei. Beidi, Yahudi yala nengdi, asal-sal kunmai neng tep, ‘Paulus cap, Silas cap popkamep’ tenen, mali upu weik pepipa, anesala weika di buluprapidi, yu weik kupidi, ila upu koupdaidi, penmai. Ukupidi, amutu nesala yuma pape, ila upu pepra koupdaidi sepra embandanmai. Sepra embandanmaidi, sun Yahudi deiyo nengdi utenepi. Ada, ‘Yason er ati ben dipterepmepedi, Paulus cap, Silas cap, akupmarengopda, doprap dokotepmepedi, ayu kunmang nesala karepkamepe,’ tenepidi, Yason er ati sepdaro dirbei.
44017006	Dirbeidi bena epterepi dinino, Paulus cap, Silas cap men epyopda, anengdi Yason cap, yuk teka tenepi neng cap doprapidi, amutu upu bongdina deiyo neng damai gipra derirbeidi, ila upu di penmai. “Abutene neng, yuk mutu yuma sun mali kuramrei deiki di, yuk mutu nesala peda, nun mali kange doupra, mali-mali kunmaptopu ukurami. Ukuda nun mutu yanmaserengpa, Yasondi ‘Telepe’ peprap, er ati dongopmaue.
44017007	Tonda, sundi, ‘Nun yuk ila nimi deiyo ngebo kunmasere. Er sida Yesus,’ pepra upu penmanga deiki di, nun tek sisi pio ila nimi deiyo ngebo, Kaisar erdi mem upu bokra derirserur upuda, anengdi yanipmange.” Ayu kupra bulupmai nengdi, sun upu bongdina deiyo neng tep pepi.
44017008	Upepipa, amutu nesala tali bulupra wekmai neng cap, sun upu bongdina deiyo neng cap, aupu gekepya deiki di, pio yu kupupa, tenimtonapu kunmaidi, ila upu penmaidi kopdai.
44017009	Ukupidi amutu upu bongdina deiyo nengdi, “Yason cap, er ati kikiman kunmangu neng cap, ‘Amenda ukuprum’ tenen, sun wenemna tep, co bo bulupra deipso,” pepipa, co bo bulupra deipi pangeda, aneng loptapi.
44017010	Loptapipa, ataru konum ipkopda, aTesalonika mutu teka tenepra weite du utopu kurami nesaladi, ‘Paulus cap, Silas cap, Berea mutu benkureng’ tenen, “Telepe dabereso,” pepra dokotepi. Dokotepipa, bisi mapbaramreianen, Berea mutu konum bereyopda, adipapu amutu Yahudi yala neng Allah upu peteremna ati bena wekrei.
44017011	Berea mutu nesalada, sun Tesalonika nesala yambul telep kuramya utopu men kurami. Sun Berea mutu nesalada, pio teleppu kurami. Sun dipru ketenepra deriramidi, Paulusdi kai peterepu upu telep kupra gekerami. Pio kange deipra gekeramidi, ‘Paulus penmaser upuda, pio tek sisi do, gum do?’ teneramidi, tumi-tumi yuma sun Allah upu buku doprapidi, wepra dirtereami.
44017012	Ukuramidi, Yahudi yala neng weike cap, Yunani yala ila nerapu cap, ton Yunani nimi cap, weika di teka tenepi.
44017013	Yuk nengdi, “Paulusda Berea mutu Allah upu peterenmare,” pepipa, Tesalonika mutu kurami Yahudi yala deiyo neng gekepi dingeda, sun peda Berea mutu bei. Beiyopda, Berea mutu bulupra wengami neng tep, yu kweipmaidi, ‘Paulus upu yanipra er popkameng’ tenen, yu kudiramidi luludirami.
44017014	Yu kudiramipa, adipapu amutu teka tenepi nengdi, ‘Sun Yahudi deiyo nengdi Paulus popnung’ tenen, “Paulus menmena berume,” peprapidi, laut mokon pirman tara dokotepi. Paulus dokotepi dinin, Silas cap, Timotius capda, Berea mutu amutupu kuramrei.
44017015	Paulus cap, er kikiman bei neng cap, gapung co wekra bukidi, laut mokon deiki di gapung co pumbon di bisi mapbaramyanen, anengdi Paulus Atena mutu dubei. Dubeipa, Paulusdi er cap kikiman yanmai neng tep, peipu. “Silas cap, Timotius cap, ‘Adipapu menmena ne kori yarenge, pepra deipsere,’ pepkurume,” Paulusdi aneng tep upepra deipupa, aneng gekepidi tamupra kai perbei.
44017016	Uda Paulusda, ‘Silas cap, Timotius cap, ne kori yankamrenge’ tenen, dinmau taruda, Atena mutu nesaladi sun buru deiki di nimi urasin utopu kupra petupra deipnedi, tali keca dinin, si eremami keca, akati arum domya neitamai weik deiami ngeda epu. Epudi, ‘Uo,’ teneprap, pio mali kange doupu.
44017017	Ange tep ngeda, tumi-tumi yuma Yahudi yala neng sun Allah upu peteremna ati wengamudi, Yahudi yala nesala cap, Yunani nesala dinin, Allah si eremami Yunani nesala cap tep, ‘Yesusdi lyemserure,’ pepra, upu lap pepra peteremamu. Tonda, ‘Ware keca kunupkup do?’ tenen, amutu nesala kunumamyai tali kunumyakarami nesala tep, Yesus upu lap pepra peteremamu.
44017018	Uda tenpu taru di, sun Epikuros tara neng cap, Setoa tara neng cap, ada akeca-keca yuma tenipeteramidi, lap perami nengda, sundi Paulus tep, upu bisiprapidi upu pepdai. Upu pepdaidi, ton tara nengdi nyek-nyek pepi. “Aupu imdanmare ngeboda, ware upu yana peterenmaser do?” pepi. Ton tara nengdi pepi. “Gume, nun walwal dinin, nun tenepmapada, ‘Sun teka tenenkameng’ tenen, sundi nun tep peteremsengetopu, er peda yuk mutu allah-allah si pepra, nun tep peterepmasere,” pepra, sunpu pepdai. Paulusdi, ‘Yesusdi lyepkamsere,’ pepra er kai telep upu cap, gam bungdina upu cap, peteremamnga tep, sundi aupu pepi.
44017019	Uda amenda taru, sun Epikuros tara neng cap, Setoa tara neng capdi, amutu upu bongdina deiyo neng utopu, Arepagus perami nengda, ‘Upu talepkamep’ tenen, wekmaiyai Paulus dopra sun kikiman bei. Dubeidi, Epikuros neng cap, Setoa tara neng capdi, Paulus tep pepi. “Kanda ukupu upu pepterepmaseremada, ‘Nun telep kupra gekeptepe’ tenen, aupu ton cap lap pepseo,” pepi.
44017020	“Apenmarem upuda, men di nun men gekenup upu, pio yuk upu penmasereme. Aupuda, ware kupkamepa tep, penmaserem do? Nun gekepterepkamepa tep lap pepseo,” pepi.
44017021	Uda Atena mutu sisa nesala cap, ton yuk mutu di yaidi amutupu ketenepra kurami nesala cap, sun pio tumi-tumi yuma ukurami. Yuk nengdi, “Nun ukupu upu ton pepkupe,” pepnopda, ‘Nun aupuda tali gekeptapkup’ tenen, gekerami. Tonda, amutu nengdi ukupu tenipne upuda, ‘Yuk neng tep lap pepkupe’ tenen, sun ukupu gekepi upu cap, sun pedi ukupu tenepi upu cap tep, “Ukupra gekepmape. Ukupra tenepmape,” pepra tali lap pertamamidi, gekerdarami.
44017022	Anengdi Paulus tep, “Lap pepseo,” pepya tep, Paulusdi Arepagus neng bulupra wekmaiyai neitamai tekrapudi aupu pepu.
44017023	Ne tali embane taruda, sun allah-allah si eremrumu keca cap, allah-allah si eremrumu mem ati cap, tenpu ngeda, gel pala yakra deiprumdi, sun allah-allah si gispal dona tep, gam keca popra karerumyaida epmasi. Allah karena tep, gel pala deiki di sekeiprumpa aupu epmasene. ‘Nun men kael kemnup Allah si eremna tep deipmape,’ pepra sekra deiprum upuda, ne konum epmasi. Ange tep, er tek sisi men kael keprum dinin, walwal di er tep gispal dopra tali si eremrum Allahda, ukuda lape pepkusene.
44017024	Uda ban-ban yuma cap, akapu keca yuma cap, men di ketekepra deipu Allahda, er dipu alau tara yuma cap, tuai tara yuma cap, talepra kurure. Allah si eremna tep, nimi sun buru deiki di talepra donung ati pumbon yumada, pio men kurure.
44017025	Gam kuna cap, isin kuna cap, uda ware keca do yuma, akapu keca yuma, er dipu nimi tuai nesala tep kareserure. Atep, akeca-keca yuma men putaretopu, nimidi donung pel yuma peda, Allah er pio men putarure.
44017026	‘Ban-ban yuma bena kunkamenge,’ tenepudi tenpu ngebo ketekepra deipupa, angebo deiki di yal kepudi, nimi yala-yala yuma weik kupu. Allahdi ayala-ayala nesala yuma men ketekepra deiamu taru di, sun kunkameng mutu cap, sun kunkameng taru cap, ‘Ukupra kunkamenge,’ tenepudi men di wepra deiamu.
44017027	Ada, nimi yala-yala yuma amenda sundi er tep epterepmengedi, ‘Epkamneng ja’ tenen, ketekepra yuk-yuk wepra deipseue.
44017028	Dinino, tek sisi ngeda, nun yuma yuk-yuk kunup dinino, nun damai kuserure. Karenai men kurure. Uda nun gam kupya cap, nun embanupa cap, nun pel dopra kunup keca yuma cap, Allah er dipapu melipra taleserura tep, nun yuma nun damai kuserure. Sun mutu sisa telep upu sengami nengdi, ‘Nun peda, er nyapupu kunupe,’ sekra pediramitopu, apu pepsene.
44017029	Petumna ila kael nengdi, perak cap, emas cap dopropmengedi, sun kange tenena deiki dipu, nimi urasin utopu kupra deipmengedi, si eremnung kecada, akecada Allah utopu men kurure. Nunda Allah er nyapu kunupa tep, anengdi doramenge keca utopu keca tep, ‘Allah kurure,’ men tenenkamepe.
44017030	Pumun di Allah diramu dinin, walwal utopu kurami ngeda, Allahdi, ‘Berbera men wenepkun’ tenen, kaukemdongoramu. Dinino, ukutaruda, Allahdi nesala ban-ban yuma tep, upeserure. “Sun mali kurumu kecada taprumdi, ne tara kepronkamrume,” upeserure.
44017031	Ada tali gume. Allahdi, ‘Atarupu wepra bokra deipkamne,’ tenepudi konum ketenepra deipka tep, amenda taru nesala ban-ban yuma tep, mali kunge keca cap, telep kunge keca cap, wepra dipterepredipu, “Ange mali, ange telepe,” pepra, telep kupra yuk-yuk wepra bokra deipkamre. Ada Allahdi peprepa, er men di wepra deipu ngebodi, tuai nesala yuma tep, yuk-yuk wepra bokra deipkamre. Allahdi, ‘Nesala ban-ban yuma teka tenenkameng’ tenen, erdi wepra deipu ngebo depmaupa, gam bukra deipka deiki di, ange yuma konum katuai lap pepmasere. Paulusdi aupu yuma abulupra wekmai neng, Arepagus neng tep, pepu.
44017032	Paulusdi Yesus gam bungdina upu tep upepupa, anengdi gekepi dingeda, ton tara nengda, nyek-nyek pepi. Dinino, ton tara nengda, “Nun putanmaserada, kan ukupu pepmaserem upu, gam bungdina upuda, yuk taru ton cap peterepsemempa, gekepkamkepe,” pepi.
44017033	Upepipa, Paulusdi sun bulupra wekmaiyai tapra, yukai beu.
44017034	Aneng kuramya neitamai di nimi tenpu-tenpu Paulus penmau upu gekeprap teka tenepidi, er tara keproyopda, Yesus tek teka tenepidi, Paulus cap kikiman embanmai. Ateka tenepi neng kuramya neitamai di, ner tenpu er sida Damaris cap, tenpu ngebo, er sida Dionisius cap, teka teneprei. Dionisiusda, Arepagus perami nengda, er peda Arepagus ngebo kuramu. Sun, aner cap, angebo cap, ton yuk nesala yambul weik cap, teka tenepi.
44018001	Uda, Atena mutu neitamai Paulusdi peteremamupa, ton tara neng teka tenepi, ton tara nengda, teka men tenepi. Ayuma konum kupkopda, Paulusdi Atena mutu tapra, Korintus mutu beu.
44018002	Korintus mutu beuopda, tenpu ngebo, er sida Akwila, ada Pontus mutu nengdi deiami ngebo, Korintus mutu kunmaupa, Paulusdi epu. Akwila cap, er ner Pereskila cap, Italia mutu kuramreipa, Roma nesala sun ila nimi deiyo ngebo, Kelaudius erdi, “Sun Yahudi yala neng yuk mutu beso,” pepka tep, sun Italia mutu taprapreidi, Korintus mutu yana kunmareipa, Paulusdi epu.
44018003	Paulus cap, aneng butenenge cap, upu talepdayopda, Paulusdi uruna tep sun ati beu. Aneng buteneda, opkal dodin ati tenda tep wiramreitopu, Paulus peda opkal dodin ati tenda wiramnga tep, sun kikiman kuramidi, tenda ati tep wirami.
44018004	Ukuramipane, Sabat tumi yuma deiki di, sun Yahudi neng Allah upu peteremna ati Paulus wengamudi, Yahudi yala neng cap, Yunani yala neng cap, sun kange tenengenge taprapmengedi, ukupu kange yuk punupmengedi, ‘Yesus teka tenenkameng’ tenen, Paulusdi lepsisingamudi Allah upu peteremamu.
44018005	Uda Silas cap, Timotius cap, Propinsi Makedonia mutu di Korintus mutu yarei pangeda, Paulusda, yuk pel yuma taprapudi, Yesus er upu tep peteremnapu kuramu. Paulus peteremamudi, Yahudi yala neng tep, “Allahdi nesala yuma lyemna tep, wepra dokotepseu ngeboda, ‘Nun Mesias ngebo ake,’ penup ngeboda, Yuk ngebo gume, Yesus er pua.” Paulusdi aupu pepra peteremamu.
44018006	Peteremamu dinin, sun Yahudi yala deiyo nengdi, Paulus peteremamu upu yanipra tapidi, er tep luludongoramipa, Paulusdi aneng sun wenemna tep, er opkal gege pepudi, aneng tep aupu pepu. “Allahdi wenepra popseryopda, sun yapi sun giso deikipu kupkamsere. Angeda, ne deiyo gume. Ukutaru dipu tali kange doupra, Yahudi yala gum neng tep, sun kori peterembenkamne.” Paulusdi aYahudi neng tep pepu.
44018007	Paulusdi aupu konum upepra sengpepkopda, aYahudi yala neng, sun Allah upu peteremna atipum di, bura tara beudi, akati dampu, tenpu ngebo, er sida Titus Yustus, er ati domngai beudi, akati ngebo cap kikiman kuramrei. Titus Yustusda, Yunani yala ngebo dinin, Allah si eremamu ngebo kuramu.
44018008	Ayahudi yala neng Allah upu peteremna ati deiyo ngebo, er sida Krispus, er cap, er ati kikiman kurami neng cap, nun deiyo ngebo Yesus tep, teka tenepi. Tonda, Korintus mutu nesala, Paulus upu gekerami nesala weik, sun gekeramidi teka teneramipa, me dongoramu.
44018009	Uda, tenpu tumi lukunda di, ken utopu keca deiki Yesusdi Paulus tep pepu. “Ne cap kikiman pio kunemnya cadi, kwar dangna gum, puto di akumemnya utopu, kware pio men kunkamrume. Tonda, dimpepra men kunkamrume, ne upupu pio peteremnapu kunkamrume.
44018010	Korintus mutu akati arum donga neitamai di, ne nyapu weik kunmanga tep, yuk nengdi men poryankamkenge,” Yesusdi Paulus tep pepu.
44018011	Aupu pepka tep, Paulusda, amutupu kuramudi, keteng tamun tenpu ton yuma mapudi, ton keteng tamunda, neitamaipu kuramu. Ataru yumada, Paulusdi amutu kurami nesala tep, Allah upu peteremamu.
44018012	Uda ukuprap peteremamu dinin, Galiodi Akaya mutu talepra Gubernur kuramu taru neitamai di, Yahudi yala deiyo neng kikiman yumadi, ‘Paulus popkup’ tenen, er upu yaniptapidi, sun upu bongdina deiyo neng upu talepmaiyai, Paulus dopra akati dubei.
44018013	Sun dubei nengdi, Paulus tep aupu pepra deipi. “Angebodi, amutu neng tep, sun kange tenenge keca taprapmengedi, ‘Yuk kange punupkameng’ tenen, Allah si eremna tep, ‘Ukuprap, ukuprap kunkamrume’ peserya deiki di, nun Allahdi pediramseu upu Paulusdi yanipra bisipmasere,” pepi.
44018014	Upepipa, Paulusdi, ‘Upu pepkun’ tenen, si ang peua kepman, Galiodi Yahudi yala neng tep pepu. “Gume. Sun Yahudi yala nengdi, ‘Angeboda, pio mali kupmare,’ peptumtoda, ne telep kupra gekeptenyopda lepsisikra deipsetene.
44018015	Dinino, sunda, tali nimi si cap, sun yala upu deiyo cap, Allahdi sun yuk pediramseu upu cap tep, pedanmaruma tep, sun pe yuk lepsikdankamrume. Neda, ato tali upuda ne men lepsikeipkusene,” Galiodi pepu.
44018016	Upepka tep, Galiodi er nyapu tep peipupa, anengdi sun Yahudi yala nesala tep, “Bura beso,” pepra upu bongdina ati pumbon di dokotepipa, bura bei.
44018017	Bura beidi, upu bongdina deiyo neng upu talepmai ati damai di, Sostenes, ada Yahudi yala neng Allah upu peteremna ati deiyo ngebo tep, taleprapidi, er nong bongopi. Sostenes ponmai dipunen, Galioda, ‘Sun yuk dapodange,’ tenepudi, kaukepronmau.
44018018	Paulusda, Korintus mutu yambul weikanun ton kuramnganen, amenda taru, amutu teka tenepra, weite du utopu kurami neng tep, “Telepe, dakurume,” pepra deipudi, Siria mutu benkamya tep, er cap, Piskila cap, Akwila cap, gapung co pum wekra bukidi, kumanya puto deiki di, mokon deiki barami. Dinino, Paulusda, men di Allah tep, “Ukupkamkene,” peiamnga tep, sun Sirya mutu benkui taruda, Kengkeria mutu beidi, Paulusdi yuk neng tep, “Ne potong toupneso,” pepupa, er potong toupi.
44018019	Mutu si Sirya mutu benkamya tep, mokon deiki banmaiyanen, bisi neitamai Efesus mutu orbei dingeda, Paulusdi Piskila cap, Akwila cap tep, “Sun dakureso,” pepra deipu dingeda, erpu sun Yahudi yala neng Allah upu peteremna ati wekrapudi, ‘Sun Yahudi yala neng Yesus tep teka tenenkameng’ tenen, Yesus er upu lap pepra peterepu.
44018020	Peterepupa, sun Yahudi nengdi, “Kanda nun yambulanun ton kikiman kunkamepe,” pepra moropipa, Paulusdi tamupra, “Gume. Neda yuk mutu ton benkamna cadi, kikiman men kunkamepe,” pepu.
44018021	Dinino, benkoua tep, gonga kepudi bau taruda, Paulusdi amutu neng tep peipu. “Uda Allahdi, ‘Tamupra berye,’ tenepneryopda, tamupra yankamne. Gum dingeda, gume.” Paulus upepudi, Kaisarea mutu bana tep, Efesus mutu di, gapung co wekra bukudi, laut mokon deiki beu.
44018022	Beudi, yuk neng cap laut mokon deiki pio banmaiyanen, Kaisarea mutu damai mokon porai gapung co lukra deriramyai bena lukeipyopda, Paulus erda, Yerusalem mutu welepudi, amutu teka tenepi neng tep, “Telepe,” pepra, gispal dopudi, acapu uruna tep kunmauanen, adipapu Antiokia mutu beu.
44018023	Antiokia mutu beuopda, amutupu yambul kuramnganen, Antiokia mutu tapra adinen, ortara mutu, Galatia tara neitamai cap, Pirgia tara neitamai cap, amutu-mutu neitamai yuk-yuk peterep embaramu. Peterep embaramudi, Paulus er peteremamu upu deiki di, amutu kuramidi Yesus kuramu keca piripra kael kepra kurami neng tep, sun dipru puto kepra deipembaramu.
44018024	Uda, Paulus tup peterep embaramu taruda, tenpu Yahudi yala ngebo, er sida, Apolos, mutu sida Aleksandia deiami ngeboda, Efesus mutu yau. Apolosda, akeca-keca yuma kael keamudi, ila kael ngebo kuramu. Tonda, Allah upu yuma ila di kael keamu.
44018025	Sundi Yesus er Bisi peteremamiya tep, erdi, ‘Aupuda, tek sisi mambul upu,’ tenepudi, Yesus kuramu keca cap, Yesus er peteremamu keca cap, puto di yuk neng tep, Yesus er peramutopu, Apolos peda, tek sisi upupu dumsisikrap peteremamu. Dinino, Yohanesdi me dongona tep, peteremamu upu, aupupu kael keamu.
44018026	Apolosdi, sun Yahudi yala neng Allah upu peteremna ati wekrapudi, kwar dangna gum, puto di gonga kepra peterepu. Peterepupa, Piskila cap, Akwila cap, er upu gekepreidi, ‘Nundi er melipkamnem’ tenen, “Nun ati yaiyo,” pepra moropreipa, sun ati beiyopda, Allah cap, Yesus Er Bisi cap tep, telep kupra lepsikra lap peramrei.
44018027	Uda amenda taru, Apolosdi, ‘Ne Akaya mutu benkaman’ tenen, putapupa, Efesus mutu teka tenepi nengdi, “E ada walito,” pepidi, er dipru kwa dipi. Ukupidi, ‘Akaya mutu teka tenepi nengdi, Apolosda sun mutu berepa, kange deipra gispal dopkamemeng’ tenen, surat sekra dokotepi. Apolos Akaya mutu beuopda, Allahdi, Akaya mutu nesala bicau tenemnga tep, tali meliamua deiki di, amutu nengdi teka tenepra kurami. Ateka tenerami nesala tep, Apolos er peteremamu upu deiki di, aneng tep weike melimamu.
44018028	Akaya mutu nesala wekmaiya neitamai di, Apolos cap, sun Yahudi yala deiyo neng capdi, upu weik pepdai. Pepdaidi, men di Allah pediramupa, er upu lap pena neng, nabi neng sengami upuda, Apolos er upu puto penmaua deiki di, “Allahdi, ‘Nimi Lyemna Deiyo Ngebo, Mesias dokotepkamsene,’ pepu ngeboda, tek sisi Yesus er pua,” pepra, telep kupra katuai lap pepu. Aupu cap, ton er peramu upu yuma cap deiki di, sun Yahudi yala deiyo neng penmai upu bisipu. Apolosdi Yahudi yala deiyo neng, sun upu bisipka deiki di, Akaya mutu teka tenerami neng tep weika di meliamu.
44019001	Apolos Korintus mutu apu tup kuramu taruda, Paulusdi tuai bisi di Galatia tara neitamai cap, Pirgia tara neitamai cap, embaramnganen, Efesus mutu beu. Efesus mutu beuopda, acapu Yesus teka tenepi neng, men di men diramu neng epudi, upu talepdaidi, Paulusdi aneng tep asipterepu.
44019002	“Sunda, Yesus teka teneprum taruda, Allah er Lek Sambala karepseu do? Gum do?” pepra, Paulusdi asipterepu. Asipterepupa, sundi tamupra pepi. “Gume. Allah er Lek Sambala akapmar upuda, pumun di men pepseiya tep, pio men teneramupudi men kael kepmupke,” pepi.
44019003	Upepya tep, Paulusdi tamupra asipterepu. “Sun me dongonada, ware kupra me dongopsei do?” pepra asipetepu. Asipetepupa, sundi tamupra pepi. “Yohanesdi, me dongoramutopu, me sisa dipu dongopseiye,” pepi.
44019004	Upepipa, Paulusdi aneng tep, tamupra pepu. “Uda Yohanes er me dongoramunge ada, nesaladi sun mali kuraminge tamamidi, amnyo karendongoramipa, Yohanesdi aneng tep me dongoramu. Deiyoda, sun mali kuraminge tapya tep, anesala me dongoramu. Tonda, Yohanes er amnyo tara yankamu ngebo Yesusda, Yohanesdi Yahudi yala neng tep pepu. ‘Sun Yesuspu teka teneprume,’ pepra peteremamu,” Paulusdi upepra lap pepu.
44019005	Paulusdi aupu peterepupa, sun men di teka tenepi neng aupu gekepidi teka tenepya tep, Paulusdi aneng tep, Yesus si deiki di me dongopu. Ukupka deiki di, Yesus er tara neng keproidi, er nyapu kepi.
44019006	Tonda, Paulus buru aneng, sun giso deiki deipu taruda, Allahdi karepupa, Allah er Lek Sambala aneng sun nong deiki yana wekupa, adeiki di sun pedipapu men kael kemami upu, yuk mutu nesala perameng upu penmai. Tonda, Allahdi aneng tep karepu upu, Allah er upu peda, lap penmai.
44019007	Ataruda, aupu penmai neng, amul dam di dana tara neng utopu, Yesus teka tenepi neng, tujuh neng nukipa dakurami.
44019008	Uda Paulusda amutupu ton cap ware weneri Efesus mutu kuramudi, Yahudi yala neng Allah upu peteremna ati wekrapudi, ‘Amutu neng ukupu teka tenenange dopropkameng’ tenen, kwar dangna gum, puto di, pio telep kupra lap peramudi, Allah upu, ada ‘Yesus lyepseredi taleserure,’ pepra aupu lepsikra peteremamu.
44019009	Paulusdi peteremamu dinin, amutu neng tenpu-tenpudi, kika deriramidi, ‘Nunda pio teka men tenepkamepe,’ tenepidi, aupu yanipidi, nimi gekeramya damai, Yesusdi “Ukupkamrume,” pepra deriramu bisi tep, mali-mali pepra derirami. Ukuramya tep, Paulusdi aneng tapra meneng damai dinin, per ortara yukai beu. Yukai benkoua tep, amutu teka tenepi neng doprapudi, sun yuma Tiranusdi nesala weik wengamipa, peteremamu ati wengami. Akati wengamidi, tumi-tumi yuma Paulusdi Yesus upu lap peramupa, sun yumadi, ‘Telep kupra kael kepkamep’ tenen, upu talerdarami.
44019010	Upu taleprap, upu lap peprap, kurami keteng tamunda, butene. Apio ukuramya tep, Yahudi yala neng cap, Yunani yala neng cap, Asia tara neitamai kurami nengda, nun deiyo ngebo Yesus, er kai telep upu gekerami.
44019011	Allah er puto di meliamupa, Paulus er buru deiki di nimi men kupmanto keca, kunupsek pen pel doramu.
44019012	Ukuramnga tep, sun nong me kilina tep, giso koudongorami opkal cap, tonda, ‘Nun opkal buta bapsurur’ tenen, lelipdongopra geterdongorami opkal cap, Paulus er bol tali beramu ngeda, aopkal doprapidi, pu jen nesala damai derirbarami. Aopkal dopra derirbaramipa, anesala pu jeramu keca gum kuramu. Tonda, aneng sun dipru neitamai wengami isok gupra barami.
44019013	Uda yuk Yahudi yala neng tenpu-tenpudi, isok taleamu nesala tep, ‘Isok goupra benkamre’ tenen, enemdongorami. Anesalada, ‘Isok taleamu nesala, sun isok enemdongonkamep’ tenen, nun deiyo ngebo Yesus, er si pepra tali pirirtereramidi, tali peptapi. Ukuramidi, anesala taleami isok tep, aupu perami. “Paulusdi peteremrur ngeboda, Yesus er si deiki di, aneng nong neitamai di goupra, bura beo pepkene,” uperami.
44019014	Uperamya utopu, sun Yahudi yala neng Allah karena deiyo neng kuramya neitamai di, tenpu ngebo, er sida Sekewa, er nyapu yonitam neng sun peda, ‘Aupu pepmepepa, isok bura benkamenge,’ tenepidi, aupu piripterepi.
44019015	Sekewa er nyapu yonitam nengdi, Yesus er si tali pepra piripterepipa, aisokdi tamupra pepu. “Yesusda, ne tek sisi kaele. Ton Paulusda, ne kael dinino, sunda, sun ware puto nengdi apenmanerum do?” pepu.
44019016	Upepupa, aisok taleamu ngebodi depra dourbena taleproudi, aneng yonitam bari neng tep pio weika di popu. Erdi aneng popka deiki di, pio bisipudi, aneng sun opkal yuma gwelepra tapu. Sun opkal gwelepra tapu di, akatipum di popkopda, sun nong bol deiki dila pio weik kupudi, yapi weik embanmaupa, sun nong banangapu sepdaro bei.
44019017	Sun Yahudi yala neng cap, Yunani yala neng cap, Efesus mutu kurami nesalada, isokdi Sekewa er nyapu popra bisipu keca lap pepipa, gekepidi, kware pio weik kupu. Kware kupupa, aneng yumadi nun deiyo ngebo Yesus, er si eremamidi, Yesus tep gispal pio weik dorami.
44019018	Tonda, ataru dipu, men di teka tenerami neng nimi weika di, sun pio mali-mali kurami ngeda, nimi gekeramya damaipu, yana lap peramidi, sun mali kunge keca tamami.
44019019	Amutu nesala men di nimi ker don pel dorami nesalada, teka konum tenerami dipunen, sun nimi ker don keca lap pena buku inipra deiami. Atep, ataruda, abuku inipra deiamya dopra, nimi dinmaiyai di, tenpai bulupra deipidi, uku dongopipa, uku jepropu. Uda animi ker dona tep, lap pena bukuda, ‘Abuku kunumna ukuprap, ukuprap’ tenen, nukrap deipidi, denge weik 50 ribu derakma nuki.
44019020	Ayuma pio telep kupya tep, nesala weik ton cap teka teneramidi tapang doramipa, weik kupbaramu. Tonda, anesalapu Allah upu gekepra dororamidi, daramdin weik ton cap teka tenepbaramidi, sun dipru wisi kupbaramupa, dumsisipu kurami.
44019021	Ayuma konum kupkopda, Paulus tenepudi pepu. “Ne Yerusalem mutu benkaman taruda, Akaya tara neitamai cap, Asia tara neitamai cap, embanmanyanen, Yerusalem mutu benkamne,” pepu. Utenepudi pepu. “Asi pepman mutu yuma konum embenyopda, ‘Roma mutu benkamne,’ tenepsa tep, tek sisi Roma mutu peda benkamne.” Paulus tenepudi pepu.
44019022	Upepudi er melimna neng butene nengda, Timotius cap, Erastus cap, menmena Makedonia mutu dokotepu dinin, erda Asia tara neitamaipu yambulanun ton kuramu.
44019023	Atarupuda, amutu Efesus mutu nesaladi, Yesusdi “Ukupkamrume,” pepra deriramu upu, er kuramutopu kuna bisi tep, yu weik kupupa, mundu deipra meteka gume, upu weik pedarami.
44019024	Uda tenpu ngebo, er si Demetrius, erda gat keca, kunumna weik keca er si perak di, metek keca petupra derina kael ngebo kuramu. Ukuramudi isok si, Artemis er si eremna ati, akati urasin utopu dinin, metekngepu petupra deriramu. Ukuramnga tep, er cap kikiman apelpu melipra doramidi, ketenepra derirami neng cap tep, erdi peramupa pel weik doramidi, apel dona tep, co bo weik dororami.
44019025	Demetriusdi, “Sun aneng yuma bulupso,” pepupa, er melipra pel dorami neng cap, apel utopu pelpu yukai dorami neng cap, bulupra wekipa, upu pepu. “Ne kayapu, sun kaele. Apel doramepya deiki dipu, nun kunumna keca weik doramepedi, nun putapsere keca yuma kunumnupe.
44019026	Uda nepu yuk gume. Sun peda angeboda, Paulus, er kure keca dirumudi, er pere upu gekerum adano. Paulus erdi, ‘Nimi buru deiki di petupra donung allah-allahda, ada pio tek sisi Allah gume,’ perure. Paulus uperya deiki di, nesala weik sun kange yuk punuamenge. Punuamudi, anesala tep dopra gwalin bisi dubaramnge. Ada nun mutu Efesuspu gume. Asia tara neitamai yuma pio ukuramnganen, metekanunpu gawal tapmare.
44019027	Uda, Paulusdi, ‘Nimi buru di doamenge keca pumbonda, tek sisi Allah men kurure,’ pepra peteremrure. Nun doramep pelda, telep teneramsei dinin, Paulusdi aupu pio peterepyopda, amenda taruda, ‘Nimidi petupra deriramenge kecada malye’ tenepmengyopda, mali pepkamseng gum daca. Angepu gume. Tonda, nun pio telep isok ner Artemis, er si eremnup atida, lepterepsengyopda, ‘Ada talya,’ tenepkameng gum daca. Ukupkamenge tenepne. Tonda, Asia tara nesala yuma cap, nesala ban-ban yuma cap, isok ner si eremnung ngeda, ada Artemis peda, nundi Artemis tep, ‘Pio telepe,’ tenenup ngeda, sundi yanipkamseng do? Yanipkamseng ja tenepne,” Demetriusdi upeprapudi, abulupra wekmai neng tep lap penmau.
44019028	Uda lap penmaupa, aneng gekepidi, yu pio weik kupupa, ataru dipu gonga keprapidi, ila upu di penmai. “Nun Efesus mutu di, si eremnup isok Artemisda pio telepe. Er puto pio weike,” pepra ila upu di penmai.
44019029	Ton cap aupupu pio penmaiyanen, amenda akati arum domya neitamai kurami nesala peda, yu di sun yuma kange wang-wang pepupa, dung-dung pepidi, kwemdanmai. Ukupidi, adipapu sun aneng yumadi, Paulus cap, Makedonia mutu di yarei nengda, Gaius cap, Aristarkus cap, talepra dopropidi, aneng yuma tenpu bisipu bulupra talepdaro kikiman bei. Talepdaro tenpu bisipu beidi, tenpu ngebo tenepmare kange utopu doupidi, amutu nesala bulupra wengamidi, upu talerami ati wekroi.
44019030	Wekroipa, Paulusdi, ‘Aneng doupra wekrong ati benedi, upu pepkune’ tenen, ketenepupane, amutu teka tenepi nengdi, “Ukuna gume,” pepra upu sekroi.
44019031	Tonda, Asia tara ila-ila deiyo nengda, Paulus er kayapu nengdi, ‘Nun kabo popnung’ tenen, akati wekra, ‘Upu pepkune,’ tenepmare ngeda, ‘Yapronkure’ tenen, aila deiyo nengdi yuk neng tep, “Paulus kao, akati wengdongona yaprume pepmakenge perberume,” pepra upu peipipa, anengdi Paulus tep lap pepi.
44019032	Ataru neitamaida, aneng doupra wekroi ati nengdi, ton tara neng cap, ton tara neng cap, upu yuk-yuk, dana di dana di ila upupu penmaidi, lelimdanmaiya tep, men gekepmanto kupidi, kange wang-wang pepupa, dung-dung pepi. Tonda, akati kapul wekmai taruda, nesala weik tarada, ‘Upu deiyo ake,’ men tenepmaidi talipu wekmai.
44019033	Animi wekmaiya neitamai di, ‘Angebodi upu pepkur’ tenen, Yahudi yala deiyo nengdi, angebo er sida Aleksander, sun buru di papra dopbanmaiyanen, aneng wekmaiya utara, sun urasin deipra dinmai tara deipi. Deipidi, animi yuma wekmaiya neitamai di tenpu-tenpu nengdi ila upu di, Aleksander tep, “Upepkurum, upepkurum,” pepra deipi. Deipipa, ‘Upu pepkun’ tenen, tekrapudi buru bata deipu.
44019034	Buri bata deipu dinin, anengdi Aleksander erda, Yahudi yala ngebo epidi, dabale kupupa, sun yuma upu kikimanpu ila upu di penmai. “Nun Efesus mutu si eremnup isok Artemisda pio telepe. Er puto pio weike,” pepra atumi tenpu dinin, upu weik pio penmai.
44019035	Upu pio penmaipa, amutu deiyo neng perami upu gekepnedi, sekrap lap peramu ngebodi, tekrapudi, “Upu yapso,” pepupa, anengda upu dimpepi. Upu dimpepipa, erdi pepu. Nun pio telep isok ner Artemis, er si eremne ati dopmupka cap, er urasin nong utopu keca, im deiki di sakupa, dopropmupu keca cap, nun Efesus mutu kunup nesaladi akeca melipra kalengnupada, ware ngebo, ware ner, men kael kepi do? Gume, nesala ban-ban yuma ange konum kael kepi.
44019036	Aupuda, tek do, telel do, men pepmanto. Tek sisi upu pepmasene. Ange tep ngeda, pio telep ngeda, sun kunmarum kecada yapkurume. Sundi sun tep, popmanto keca berbera men kunkurume.
44019037	Adiso, anengda, nun allah-allah si eremnup ati pumbon deamupu keca upula men dopramserei. Tonda, nun isok ner Artemis tep, si mali-mali pepra, lulupra men deiamserei dipunen, sundi aneng dopra akati denmarume.
44019038	Atep, akonum pepmasene. Demetrius cap, er dorur pel utopu pel donge neng cap, sundi yuk neng tep, mali kupmasenge upuda, ton tupa kupmaseryopda, nun gubenur upu lepsingna deiyo ngebo akapmare. Tonda gubenur erdi upu bong disere taruda, sun aneng peda upu ton kuptuopda, acapu sun pedipu, “Erdi mali kupmanere,” pepra wepra pepdatenge.
44019039	Tonda, sun peda, upu ton kupseryopda, nun deiyo nengdi, “Upu talepkupe,” pepmenge tarupu, sun cap aneng cap, upu talepra lepsikamrume. Aca gume, tonda yuk taru ton gume, sun upu bongdina tarupu pepkamrume. Ukutaru gume.
44019040	Dinino, atumi kunmap keca tep, yuk nengdi dopra nun deiyo neng damai perbesetengopda, sun gekepmengedi, “Sundi upu talepdaidi, kange wang-wang pepupa, dung-dung pepidi, kwepdaiya deiki di, nun deiyo neng kuramep keca sun anengdi yanipmasenge,” pepkamsetenge. Upepsetengopda, aupu pepdanmapdi kwepdanmapnge cap, dung-dung pepmapnge cap, “Nunda adeiyo tep upu talepmapa,” men peptepe. Deiyo men kwapmaserpapu kunmapa tepa. Amutu deiyo neng perami upu gekepnedi, sekrap lap peramu ngebo, Sekretaris ngebodi pepu. Aupu pepu ngeboda, ada amutu deiyo neng perami upu gekepnedi, sekrap lap peramu ngebodi, akati bulupra wekmai neng yuma tep pepu.
44019041	Ayuma konum pepkopda, abulupra wekmai neng yuma tep, “Ukuda konuma. Sun yuk-yuk tali-tali embaso,” pepupa akati tapra bendopi.
44020001	Efesus mutu nesaladi Yesus upu tep, yu kupupa, upu koudana cap, mali-mali kuna cap, akunmainge yuma konum kupidi, dimpepyopda, Paulusdi Efesus mutu nesala Yesus kuramu keca piripra kael keamidi, teka tenepi nesala, kongpepu. Kongpepupa, yaipa, sun dipru kwa dimna tep upu pepra deipudi, “Telepe ne bene. Sun dakurume,” pepra, amutu tapra, Makedonia mutu beu.
44020002	Makedonia mutu beuopda, amutu neitamai yuma embaramu taruda, amutu teka tenepi neng, sun dipru kwa dimna upu weik pepra deipembaramnganen, amenda taru, laut mokon di dana-dana yuma sekdongomu mutu, Yunani mutu neitamai beu.
44020003	Yunani mutu beuopda, ware weneri pio apu kuramnganen erdi, ‘Siria mutu benkamne’ tenen, ketenepra deiamu taruda, sun Yahudi yala nengdi, ‘Paulus popkamepa’ tenen, upu sisingamya tep, Paulus gekepudi, ‘Ne Makedonia mutu neitamai abisipu tamupra benkamne,’ tenepu.
44020004	Tenepudi amutu beu taruda, er cap kikiman bei neng sida ake. Berea mutu ngebo Pirus er mi Sopater cap, Tesalonika mutu butene nengda, Aristarkus cap, Sekundus cap, Derebe mutu ngebo Gaius cap, tonda, Timotius cap, ton Asia tara butene nengda, Tikikus cap, Terofimus cap, aneng cap, Saulus cap, sun yuma kikiman Makedonia tara neitamai mapbarami.
44020005	Makedonia neitamai mapbarami dinin, aneng yumada, Makedonia tara tapra, menmena benmaidi, Teroas mutu apu kunmaidi, ‘Sun aneng ware taru yankameng do?’ tenen, Paulus cap, nun cap tep, dinmasei.
44020006	Dinino, nun yukpu, Yahudi yala neng Nena Gum Roti kalemna konum kalepropmupkopda, Filipi mutu di, gapung co pumbon wekra bukmupudi, gonga kepra baramupupane, pamu tumi konum kupkopda, Teroas mutu bepudi, men di bei neng cap epdapu. Epdapudi nun yuma amutupu yonitam tumi ton cap kunmapu.
44020007	Teroas mutupu akunmapupane, ngantan tumi konum kupkopda, nangantan tumi ipropkopda, ‘Nun yuma jen kikiman jepkup’ tenen, bulupra tenpu atipu wekmupu. Wekmupupa, Paulusdi, ‘Ambutumi konum benkamane,’ tenepka tep, Paulusdi amutu teka tenepi neng tep, gonga keprapudi, pio peteremaupane, manduk pena kupu.
44020008	Nun yuma bulupra wekmapkati alau atida, weica weik upmai.
44020009	Upmaipa, tenpu kaber nyapu, er sida Eutikus, jendela bisi bon bukmaupa, Paulusdi Allah upu pio penmaupane, angeboda ukunmaupa, u nemari dungpenmauanen, u pio weik kupkopda, jendela bisi bon mapudi, kange men doupudi, mapra udakrou taruda, ati dukra domyada weneri ati cadi, angebo sakapudi, tuai dourbeuopda, popu. Popupa, aneng ati dam kwerepidi bena erepropipane, angebo konum depu.
44020010	Depkopda, Paulus kwerepudi angebo damai yauopda, angebo nong deiki iriprap mapudi, Paulusdi pepu. “Sunda, ‘Uo, ami konum depmara,’ tenenmarumdi mali kange doupmarumada, yapso. Ukutaruda, er konum gam bukre,” Paulusdi pepu.
44020011	Ayuma konum kupkopda, Paulus tamupra alau ati welepudi, jen bokra deipseupane, nun jepmupke. Jepmupkopda, Paulus upu ton cap penmaupane, berekupa, er beu.
44020012	Asakmau ngebo sun ati dubeidi, ‘Ae, angeboda, konum gam bukmara tep, angeda telepe pua,’ tenepidi kange deipi.
44020013	Nun yuk menmena gapung co bena wekra bukrapmupudi, Paulus cap, nun kikiman benkamupu mutu tep, mokon deiki di Asos mutu bemupu. Paulusdi, “Ne tuai bisi benkamna tep, sun menmena mokon deiki berume,” pepra deipseua tep, ukupmupu.
44020014	Nunda, menmena Asos mutu bena kunmapupane, Paulus amenda yaupa, epdapudi, er cap agapung co pumbon wekra bukupa, nun kikiman mokon deiki bepudi, laut mokon di dana-dana sekdongomu mutu, Pulau Metilene mutu bemupu.
